T06abhsubhu:7: śamathānukūlyaṃ punareṣu sthāneṣu kṛtakauśalasya niḥsaṃdehatayā yatheṣṭamālaṃbane aikāgrayayogena sukhaṃ cittasamādhānataḥ
T06abhsubhu:8: / vipaśyanāvṛddhayānu kūlyaṃ bahubhiḥ prakāraiḥ jñeyaparīkṣayā prajñāprakarṣagamanataḥ
T06abhsubhu:12: saparigrahadehagrahaṇena bāhyasyādhyātmikasya ca rūpaskandhasya grahaṇaṃ veditavyam /
T06abhsubhu:15: tathāhi loke prāyeṇa vijñāne ātmagrāhaḥ, śeṣeṣvātmīyagrāha iti //
T06abhsubhu:17: ṣaḍākāro 'tīto vartamānaścopabhogo vijñānaṣaṭkam, tasya dhāraṇamāśrayālaṃbana bhāvataḥ /
T06abhsubhu:35: evaṃ caivaṃ ceti varṇasaṃsthānabhedaiḥ citrīkārateti tathāsaṃjñā /
T06abhsubhu:39: tathāhi śubhānāmaśubhānāṃ vā vipāka ālayavijñānaṃ nityamupekṣayaiva saṃprayuktaṃ bhavati /
T06abhsubhu:48: yacca tasya cakṣuṣo bījamupacitamālayavijñānaṃ yata āyatyāṃ cakṣunirvartiṣyate,
T06abhsubhu:49: vaipākyaṃ ca yato nirvṛttam, tadapi dvividhaṃ bījaṃ cakṣurdhāturityucyate,
T06abhsubhu:53: taddhātuvaddraṣṭavyaṃ tacca yathāyogamiti yena cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi drakṣyati yacca tadbījamityevamādi yojayitavyam //
T06abhsubhu:64: lakṣaṇataḥ saṃniveśato 'nugrahopaghātataḥ kriyāsaṃniśrayataḥ kriyālakṣaṇataḥ maṇḍanataśca caturṇā daśānāmaṣṭānāmekaikasya ca
T06abhsubhu:83: spraṣṭavyaikadeśavyavasthānamāmarśanata ātulanataḥ sparśanata āpīḍanataḥ saṃsargato dhātuvaiṣamyasāmyataśca
T06abhsubhu:102: avyavahārakuśalasyāśikṣitabhāṣatayā rūpe saṃjñā bhavati na tu rūpamiti /
T06abhsubhu:110: vedanāsaṃjñāvarjyānāṃ sarveṣāṃ caitasikānāṃ cittaviprayuktānāṃ ca saṃskāraskandhalakṣaṇatve cetanāmātrasyaiva tannidaśe grahaṇaṃ tatpūrvakatvāditareṣāmiti kāraṇajñāpanārthamāha - yayā kuśalatvāya cetayata ityevamādi /
T06abhsubhu:114: cetanādīnāṃ caitasikānāṃ lakṣaṇataḥ karmataśca nirdeśo veditavyaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:119: ālaṃbane cittadhāraṇaṃ tatraiva punaḥ punarāvarjanaṃ veditavyam /
T06abhsubhu:121: vijñānotpattāvindriyasya sukhādivedanotpattyanukūlo yo vikārastadākāraḥ sparśo veditavyaḥ
T06abhsubhu:124: ata eva tatpradhāno 'nyaiḥ saṃhartu na śakyate saṃstutaṃ vastu pūrvānubhūtaṃ veditavyam
T06abhsubhu:131: śakyatve 'bhilāṣākārā, śakyaṃ mayā prāptuṃ niṣpādayituṃ veti /
T06abhsubhu:133: upapattiprātilambhikaṃ śrutacintāmayaṃ bhāvanāmayaṃ ca yathākramaṃ vipākāgamādhigamarūpaṃ veditavyam /
T06abhsubhu:141: sāsravā dharmā āsravā āsravasthānīyāśca viṣayā iha veditavyāḥ /
T06abhsubhu:162: nāsti dattaṃ nāstīṣṭaṃ nāsti kṛtaṃ nāsti sucaritaṃ nāsti duścaritamityayaṃ hetvapavādaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:163: nāsti duścaritasucaritānāṃ karmaṇāṃ phalavipāka iti phalāpavādaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:164: nāstyayaṃ loko nāsti paraloko nāsti mātā nāsti pitā nāsti sattva upapāduka iti kriyāpavādaḥ, lokāntaragamanāgamanakriyāyā bījādhānakriyāyāḥ pratisaṃdhibandhakriyāyāścāpavādāt /
T06abhsubhu:176: rūpādayo nātmā, tadvilakṣaṇatvāt na hi te ātmalakṣaṇā iti /
T06abhsubhu:183: na hi vinā dehenā tmaparikalpa upalabhyata iti /
T06abhsubhu:186: kaścitparikalpayet tathāpi nopapadyate 'rūpādika ātmā, ayatnato mokṣadoṣāt /
T06abhsubhu:188: rūpāmātmeti samanupaśyati vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānamātmeti samanupaśyatītyetāḥ pañcātmadṛṣṭayaḥ
T06abhsubhu:190: rūpavān yāvadvijñānavāniti saṃbandhenātmīyatā, sā hi tatsaṃvandhāttadvān
T06abhsubhu:193: yasya hi yadvaśena vartate dāne viniyoge vā tasya tadātmīyamityucyate /
T06abhsubhu:194: rūpe yāvadvijñāne ātmetyavinirbhāgavṛttyātmīyatā, ayamātmāeṣvanusṛto vistṛtaḥ prakṣipto 'ṅgāṅgānusārigata iti parikalpanāt //
T06abhsubhu:196: tadyathā rajjuṃ sarpato gṛhṇāti kaścit sahasā, na punā rajjuriti nirūpayaṃstāṃ sarpato gṛhṇīyāditi
T06abhsubhu:200: dharmataiṣā yadavadyaṃ praticchādayataḥ kaukṛtyam, ataścāsparśavihāra iti /
T06abhsubhu:213: bahirdhāvikṣepaḥ śrutādikuśale prayuktasya tadālaṃbanādbahiḥ kāmaguṇeṣu cittagamanaṃ veditavyam
T06abhsubhu:215: nimittavikṣepaḥ pare māṃ guṇavattayā saṃbhāvayiṣyantītyetannimittametadartha kuśalaprayuktasya śanaiḥ tatparihāṇito veditavyaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:220: nimittīkāraḥ tasyaiva veditasya punaḥ punaścitrīkāro veditavyaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:221: manaskāravikṣepaḥ samāpattyantaraṃ vā samāpadyamānasya dhyānāntaraṃ vā saṃśrayataḥ pūrvasmāddhyutthānato veditavyaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:224: andhakāranimittasya manasikaraṇam, sarvārambhāṇāmadhyupekṣaṇam punaḥ punastatkālanidrābhyāsaḥ, mantrabalena parainidropasaṃhārastathā saṃvāhanādibhirveti /
T06abhsubhu:226: kuśalā(di)bhāvavacanaṃ na tvavaśyaṃ mohātmaka iti kṛtvā /
T06abhsubhu:233: anabhipretaṃ karaṇamabhipretapūrvikā sucaritaduścaritakriyā, anabhipretaṃ karaṇaṃ parairbalādavaṣṭabhya kāryamāṇasya kleśābhibhavādvā yathāyogaṃ
T06abhsubhu:239: cetanāṃ vā niśritya prajñāṃ vetyanabhyūhābhyūhāvasthāyāṃ yathākramam /
T06abhsubhu:245: rāgapratipakṣo vairāgyam, tasya paripanthakaraṇam, tasya tena tadutpattāvantarāyakaraṇāt
T06abhsubhu:247: cittaviprayuktānāṃ saṃskārāṇāmadhiṣṭhānataḥ svabhāvataḥ prajñaptitaśca nirdeśo veditavyaḥ
T06abhsubhu:256: prāptiḥ pratilambhaḥ samāgama iti prajñaptiriti prajñaptinirdeśaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:262: nirodha iti samāpatticittakṛtaḥ kālāntaramasthāvaracittacaittasamudācāranirodho āśrayasyāvasthāviśeṣo nirudhyate 'neneti kṛtvā /
T06abhsubhu:265: ete ca samāpattī bhūmitaḥ manaskārato 'dhiṣṭhānataḥ svabhāvataḥ prajñaptitaśca nirdeṣṭe āsaṃjñikaṃ manaskāravarjairebhireva /
T06abhsubhu:268: sthitikālaniyama iyantaṃ kālamanenāsmin nikāyasabhāge 'vasthātavyaṃ varṣaśataṃ varṣasahasraṃ
T06abhsubhu:273: bāhyasyāpi rūpasya jātimattve nikāyasabhāgamātragrahaṇaṃ sattvasaṃtāne lakṣaṇaprajñaptijñāpanārtham
T06abhsubhu:274: bāhyaṃ hi rūpaṃ saṃvarttavivarttaprabhāvitamā dhyātmikāstu jātijarādiprabhāvitā iti /
T06abhsubhu:276: ete ca jātyādayo na pratikṣaṇaṃ veditavyāḥ kiṃtarhi prabandhāvasthāsviti /
T06abhsubhu:277: svabhāvādhivacanaṃ cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ devo manuṣya ityevamādi /
T06abhsubhu:283: paryāyākṣaraṇatāmupādāyeti yathā cakṣuścakṣurityetasmātparyāyādanyeṣvapi netrākṣinayanalocanādiṣu paryāyāntareṣu kṣarati, tairapi tatsaṃjñānāt /
T06abhsubhu:284: naivaṃ a ityetadakṣaraṃ a ityetaṃ paryāyaṃ mukttvā paryāyāntareṇa śakyate jñāpayitum, ataḥ paryāyākṣaraṇādakṣarāaṇi /
T06abhsubhu:286: prabandhānupacchede pravṛttivyavasthānamekasmin kṣaṇe vyavacchinne vā tadupacārābhāvāt hetuphalanānātvamiṣṭasya phalasya sucaritamaniṣṭasya duścaritamityevamādi /
T06abhsubhu:291: hetuphalasya prabandhena pravṛttau satyāṃ yattatra hetuphalamutpannaniruddhaṃ so 'tītaḥ kāla iti prajñapyate, yadanutpannaṃ so 'nāgataḥ kālaḥ, yadutpannāniruddhaṃ sa pratyutpannaḥ kāla iti /
T06abhsubhu:296: hi hetuphalasyendriyāparibhedo vipayābhāsagamanaṃ tajjñānaṃ manaskārapratyupasthānaṃ ceti
T06abhsubhu:298: ityevamete cittaviprayuktāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ dharmāṇāmavasthāsu prajñapanātsarve prajñaptisanto veditavyāḥ /
T06abhsubhu:318: yasmāttena vinā upāttamādi spaṣṭatvaṃ bījaṃ karma na yujyate /
T06abhsubhu:321: tadyathāntareṇālayavijñānaṃ āśrayopādānāsaṃbhavataḥ ādipravṛtyasaṃbhavataḥ spaṣṭapravṛttyasaṃbhavato bījatvāsaṃbhavataḥ karmāsaṃbhavataḥ kāyikānubhavāsaṃbhavatācittakasamāpattyasaṃbhavato vijñānacyutyasaṃbhavataśca (Abhidh-s-bh 12)
T06abhsubhu:330: api ca ṣaṇṇāṃ vijñānakāyānāṃ sā jātirnopalabhyate yāvyākṛtavipākasaṃgṛhītā syāt /
T06abhsubhu:332: api ca pratiniyatāśrayāḥ ṣaḍvijñānakāyāḥ pravartante, tatra yena yenāśrayeṇa
T06abhsubhu:333: yadvijñānaṃ pravartate tadeva tenopāttaṃ syādavaśiṣṭasyānupāttateti na
T06abhsubhu:336: / api ca punaḥ punarāśrayasyopādāna doṣaḥ prasajyate /
T06abhsubhu:337: tathāhi cakṣurvijñānamekadā pravartate ekadā na pravarttate evamavaśiṣṭāni /
T06abhsubhu:340: kuśalākuśalato 'pi tajjātyanupalaṃbhato 'pi pratiniyatāśrayato 'pi punaḥ punarupādānadoṣato 'pi na yujyate //
T06abhsubhu:342: sa cetkaścidvadedyadyālaya vijñānamasti tena dvayoḥ vijñānayoḥ yugapatpravṛttirbhaviṣyati
T06abhsubhu:343: sa idaṃ syādvacanīyaḥ - adoṣa eva bhavāndoṣasaṃjñī /
T06abhsubhu:347: tathāhi tatra manaskāro 'pi nirviśiṣṭa indriyamapi viṣayo 'pi //
T06abhsubhu:348: kena kāraṇenāsatyāṃ yugapadvijñānapravṛttau manovijñānasya cakṣurādivijñānasahānucarasya spaṣṭatvaṃ na saṃbhavati /
T06abhsubhu:349: tathāhi yasmin samaye 'tītamanubhūtaṃ viṣayaṃ samanusmarati tasmin samaye 'vispaṣṭo
T06abhsubhu:350: manovijñānapracāro bhavati na tu tathā vartamānaviṣayo manaḥpracāro
T06abhsubhu:353: kena kāraṇena bījatvaṃ na saṃbhavati ṣaṇṇāṃ vijñānakāyānāmanyonyam /
T06abhsubhu:356: madhyadhātukānantaraṃ praṇītadhātukam, evaṃ praṇītadhātukānantaraṃ yāvaddhīnadhātukam, sāsravānantaramanāsravam, anāsravānantaraṃ
T06abhsubhu:358: na ca teṣāṃ tathā bījatvaṃ yujyate /
T06abhsubhu:359: dīrghakālasamucchinnāpi ca saṃtatiścireṇa kālena pravartate, tasmādapi na yujyate //
T06abhsubhu:360: kena kāraṇenāsatyāṃ yugapadvijñānapravṛttau karma na saṃbhavati /
T06abhsubhu:362: etā vijñaptayaḥ kṣaṇe kṣaṇe yugapatpravartamānā upalabhyante /
T06abhsubhu:363: na caikasya vijñānasyaikasmin kṣaṇe idamevaṃrūpaṃ vyatibhinnaṃ karma yujyate //
T06abhsubhu:365: tathāhyekatyasya yoniśo vāyoniśo vā cintayato vānuvitarkayato vā samāhitacetaso vāsamāhitacetaso vā ye kāye kāyānubhavā utpadyante 'nekavidhā bahunānāprakārāste na bhaveyurupalabhyante ca /
T06abhsubhu:368: tathāhya saṃjñisamāpannasya vā nirodhasamāpannasya vā vijñānameva kāyādapakrāntaṃ syāt /
T06abhsubhu:373: tathāhi cyavamānasya vijñāna mūrdhvadehaṃ vā śotikurvan vijahāti, adhodehaṃ vā /
T06abhsubhu:375: ato 'pyālayavijñānasyaiva dehopādāna kasya vigamāddehaśītatā upa[la]bhyate dehāpratisaṃvedanā ca /
T06abhsubhu:378: mano nirvacanata ālaṃbanataḥ saṃprayogataḥ pravṛttikālataśca nirdiṣṭaṃ veditavyam /
T06abhsubhu:386: dhātvāyatanānāṃ nāsti pṛthaglakṣaṇavyavasthānam, skandhanirdeśa eva cakṣurādīnāmuktalakṣaṇatvāt
T06abhsubhu:391: ananyathīma vatā sadaiva bhāvanāṃ nirātmatayā draṣṭavyā /
T06abhsubhu:398: nimittāni rūpaṃ vedanā yāvadbodhiriti prapañcitāni, teṣāṃ tatropaśamādanimittam /
T06abhsubhu:400: yadaviparītam, tasya koṭiḥ paryantaḥ, nairātmyātpareṇa tattvāparyepaṇāt /
T06abhsubhu:401: ākāśaṃ rūpābhāva iti rūpasyava viparyayeṇābhāvalakṣaṇo yo dharmo manovijñānaviṣayastadākāśam
T06abhsubhu:407: te 'pi śaśaviṣāṇādayo nāsyaiva vidyamānasya rūpasya viparyayeṇa, (Abhidh-s-bh 15)
T06abhsubhu:413: yo nirodho na ca visaṃyoga ityanuśayāsamuddhātāt /
T06abhsubhu:415: dvayamidaṃ prahātavyam - kleśāśca tadāśrayabhūtaṃ ca vastu veditam /
T06abhsubhu:421: ata eva dvitīye dhyāne duḥkhanirodhasyāsaṃskṛtā[vya]vasthānam, vaikārikasya veditasyāśeṣamaprahāṇāt
T06abhsubhu:422: rūpaskandhena daśarūpiṇo dhātavaḥ saṃgṛhītāḥ, dharmadhātunā sa eva, mana āyatanena sapta vijñānadhātava ityevaṃ sarvadharmāstrayo bhavanti //
T06abhsubhu:424: cakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇānāṃ pratyekaṃ dvitve sati kathaṃ dhātūnāṃ naikaviṃśatitvam /
T06abhsubhu:425: yadyapi caiṣāṃ dvitvaṃ na tu dhātvantaratvam,
T06abhsubhu:433: yathā dvayoścakṣuṣorunmiṣitayoḥ rūpagrahaṇaṃ spaṣṭaṃ bhavati na tathaikasminneveti /
T06abhsubhu:434: tadyathā ekasminnapavarake dvayoḥ pradīpayorekaṃ prabhāpratānaṃ spaṣṭataraṃ dvau pradīpau niśritya varttate /
T06abhsubhu:436: ekaikenendriyadvāreṇa vicitraviṣayapratyupasthāne tatprakāreṣu kiṃ krameṇa vijñānānyutpadyante āhosyidyugapadekam /
T06abhsubhu:441: yathā svaprade śamavaṣṭabhya pradīpapratānavat śabdapratānasyotpādo draṣṭavyaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:442: yattvāsannatiraskṛtasya śabdasyāspaṣṭaṃ śravaṇaṃ bhavati tacchabdasya pratighātitvādāvaraṇasauṣiryasvalpoktito veditavyam //
T06abhsubhu:443: ṣaṇṇāṃ vijñānānāṃ kati vijñānāni savikalpakāni katyavikalpakāni /
T06abhsubhu:446: tatra svabhāvavikalpaḥ pratyutpanneṣu saṃskāreṣvanubhūyamāneṣu yaḥ svalakṣaṇākāro vikalpaḥ
T06abhsubhu:448: / abhinirūpaṇāvikalpo yo 'tītānāga tapratyutpanneṣu viparokṣeṣvabhyūhanākāro vikalpaḥ // api khalu sapta vikalpāḥ ālaṃbane svarasavāho vikalpaḥ sanimitto 'nimittaḥ paryeṣakaḥ pratyavekṣakaḥ kliṣṭo
T06abhsubhu:455: tathāhyekadābhyūhamānaḥ paryeṣate, ekadā pratyavekṣate, ekadā kliṣṭo bhavati, ekadākliṣṭa iti //
T06abhsubhu:456: yadā rūpādiprativijñaptikaṃ vijñānaṃ tatkena kāraṇena cakṣurādivijñānamityucyate na rūpādibhijñānamiti
T06abhsubhu:459: cakṣuṣi vijñānaṃ cakṣurvijñānam, āśrayadeśe vijñānotpattitaḥ, sati ca tasmistadbhāvāt /
T06abhsubhu:460: tathāhi sati cakṣuṣi cakṣurvijñānamavaśyamutpadyate anandhānāmanandhato 'ndhakārasyāpi darśanāt
T06abhsubhu:465: tadyathā kāmalavyādhyupahatena (Abhidh-s-bh 17) cakṣuṣā nīlādirūpeṣvapi pītadarśanameva bhavatīti /
T06abhsubhu:468: tathāhi vijñānasaṃprayuktenānubhavenendriyasyānugraha upaghāto vā bhavati, na viṣayasyeti
T06abhsubhu:469: cakṣurvijñānaṃ cakṣurvijñānam, ubhayoḥ sattvasaṃkhyātatvāt na tvavaśyaṃ rūpasyeti //
T06abhsubhu:470: kiṃ tāvaccakṣū rūpāṇi paśyatīti veditavyamatha vijñānam /
T06abhsubhu:471: naikaṃ nāparaṃ paśyatīti veditavyam, nirvyāpāratvāt dharmāṇām /
T06abhsubhu:473: api khalu ṣaḍbhirākāraiḥ cakṣuṣo rūpadarśane prādhānyaṃ veditavyaṃ na vijñānasya /
T06abhsubhu:484: etacca yathoktaṃ sarva vijñānasya na saṃbhavatīti /
T06abhsubhu:486: yathā dhātuṣvāyataneṣu cāsaṃskṛtaṃ vyavasthāpitamevaṃ kasmānna skandheṣvapi vyavasthāpitam
T06abhsubhu:489: sa ca nityasya na saṃbhavatīti na skandheṣvasaṃskṛtavyavasthānam //
T06abhsubhu:490: kena kāraṇena ta eva dharmā skandhadhātvāyatanamukhaiḥ pṛthagdeśitāḥ /
T06abhsubhu:492: tathāhi skandhanirdeśe ye rūpavijñāne samāsena nirdiṣṭe te dhātvāyataneṣvekādaśadhā /
T06abhsubhu:493: saptadhā ca bhittvā vyāsena (Abhidh-s-bh 18) nirdiṣṭe yathāyogam /
T06abhsubhu:494: ye tu tatra vedanādayo vyastāḥ te dhātvāyataneṣu dharmadhātvāyatanatvena samastā iti /
T06abhsubhu:496: grāhyagrāhakagrahaṇavyavasthānato dhātunirdeśaḥ, grahaṇāya dvārabhūtasya grāhyagrāhakamātrasya vyavasthānata āyatananirdeśo veditavyaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:501: ārūpyopapannasya pṛthagjanasya cakṣurheturiti tataḥ pracyutya rūpiṇi dhātāvupapadyamānasya yasmādālayavijñānasaṃniviṣṭāccakṣurbījācca kṣurnirvartiṣyate, na tvāryasya punaranāgamanāditi // kāyadhāturna kāya ārūpyopapannasya pṛthagjanasya yaḥ kāyadhāturityetadatra vaktavyam,
T06abhsubhu:505: jāto bhūtaḥ nirvṛtti vṛddhi cādhikṛtya yathākramam // ārūpyāvacareṇa manasārūpyāvacarān svabhūmikānanāsravāṃśca dharmān vijānātītyāryaśrāvakamadhikṛtya /
T06abhsubhu:507: iha dhārmikastu kaścitpūrvaśrutaparibhāvanāvaśādūrdhvabhūmikānapyālaṃbate tadutpādanārtham yathā rūpaṃ tathānubhava iti sukhādivedanīyādindriyārthadvayātsukhādivedanotpatteḥ /
T06abhsubhu:508: yathā vedayate tathā saṃjānīta iti yathānubhavaṃ nimittodgrahaṇāt /
T06abhsubhu:509: yathā saṃjānīte tathā cetayati yathāsaṃjñaṃ karmābhisaṃskaraṇāt /
T06abhsubhu:510: yathā cetayate tathā vijñānaṃ tatra tatropagaṃ bhavatīti yathābhisaṃskāraṃ viṣayeṣu gatyantareṣu ca vijñānapariṇāmāt //
T06abhsubhu:512: yatra saṃkliśyate vyavadāyate ceti sendriye kāye /
T06abhsubhu:517: sā punaḥ apekṣātṛṣṇā abhinandanātṛṣṇā adhyavasānatṛṣṇā āmatṛṣṇā viṣayatṛṣṇā kāmatṛṣṇā samāpattitṛṣṇā duścaritaduḥkhatṛṣṇā sucaritasukhatṛṣṇā viprakṛṣṭatṛṣṇā sanikṛṣṭatṛṣṇā ca /
T06abhsubhu:518: asyāḥ tṛṣṇāyā ālaṃbanatvena yathākramamatītādayaḥ prakārā yojitavyāḥ /
T06abhsubhu:520: utpannānutpannabhedato grāhakagrāhyabhedato bahirmukhāntarmukhabhedataḥ kliṣṭākliṣṭabhedato viprakṛṣṭasaṃnikṛṣṭabhedataśvātītādīni yathāyogaṃ veditavyāni /
T06abhsubhu:528: tadyathā loke yena śarīrapradeśena bhāra uhyate tatra skandhopacāro dṛṣṭaḥ, skandhena bhāramuddhahatīti
T06abhsubhu:532: sarvaprakāradharmasaṃgrahaṇena sūtrāntaranirdiṣṭānāṃ pṛthivīdhātvādīnāmanyeṣāmapi dhātūnāmeṣvevāṣṭādaśasu yathāyogaṃ saṃgrahaṇādveditavyam //
T06abhsubhu:536: eteṣāṃ punaḥ sūtrapadānāmartha ātmaśucisukhanityaviparyāsapratipakṣeṇa yathākramamanātmatāmupādāyetyevamādibhiḥ padarveditavyaḥ //
T06abhsubhu:537: kathaṃ kati kimarthibhiriti praśnatrayavyavasthāpanaṃ lakṣaṇavastusaṃmohayoḥ samāropasya ca prahāṇārtham /
T06abhsubhu:538: tatra kathaṃ dravyasaditi dravyasato lakṣaṇanirdeśena tatsaṃmohaḥ prahīyate /
T06abhsubhu:539: sarvāṇi dravyasantītyanena vastusaṃmohaḥ prahīyate ātmadravyābhiniveśatyājanārthamityanena samāropaḥ prahīyate /
T06abhsubhu:541: abhilāpanirapekṣa indriyagocarastadyathā rūpaṃ vedanetyevamādikaṃ nāmnācitrayitvā yasyārthasya grahaṇaṃ bhavati /
T06abhsubhu:548: yena saṃkliśyate vyavadāyate ceti rāgādibhiścetasikaiḥ śraddhādibhiśceti veditavyam /
T06abhsubhu:549: yā ca tatrāvastheti rūpacittacetasikāvasthāsu prajñaptāścittaviprayuktāḥ saṃskārāḥ /
T06abhsubhu:552: punastrayodaśavidhasya vijñānasya yo viṣayaḥ tajjñeyamanena pradarśitam /
T06abhsubhu:553: tatpunaḥ śrutamayaṃ jñānaṃ cintāmayaṃ jñānaṃ laukikabhāvanāmayaṃ jñānaṃ paramārthajñānaṃ paracittajñānaṃ dharmajñānam anvayajñānaṃ duḥkhajñānaṃ samudayajñānaṃ nirodhajñānaṃ mārgajñānaṃ kṣayānutpādajñānaṃ mahāyānajñānaṃ ca /
T06abhsubhu:561: vidūṣaṇāyāsamutthāpanāyānutpāde jñāne niṣṭhāyāṃ mahārtheṣu jñānaṃ tadvidūṣaṇajñānaṃ yāvanmahārthajñānamiti yojayitavyam /
T06abhsubhu:571: sarvakālamaparicchinnākāratvāt citrākāravijñaptirekasyāneka ākāro vicitraśceti durvyavasthāpanādasyāḥ sūkṣmatvam /
T06abhsubhu:572: sahabhāvavijñaptirekakālotpannāti vijñānāni kathaṃ pṛthagyathāsvaṃ viṣayaṃ paricchindantīti durvyavasthāpanātsūkṣmatvam /
T06abhsubhu:574: vipakṣapratipakṣalaghuparivṛttivijñaptiḥ kathaṃ rāgādisamastabandhanaṃ cittaṃ tanmuhureva sakṛdvītarāgādikaṃ bhavatīti /
T06abhsubhu:575: vāsanāvijñaptiḥ kathaṃ karmabhiḥ samudācaradbhiḥ cittaṃ vāsyate, na ca tasmādanyā sā vāsanā, nāpi tanmātrameva, phaladānaṃ ca prati krameṇa vṛttilābha iti /
T06abhsubhu:576: pratisaṃdhivijñaptiḥ kathamanekaprakārātmabhāvanirvartakakarmaparibhāvitaṃ sadvijñānaṃ tathāpyaparisphuṭāyāṃ maraṇāvasthāyāṃ sahasā prabuddhayānyatarakarmavāsanāmanyatarasyāṃ gatau pratisaṃdhi vadhnānīti muktavijñaptiḥ kathamarhataścittaṃ paramaṃ niṣprapañcaṃ dharmatāprāptaṃ saṃsārocitasarvaprakārasāśravacaryā samatikrāntamanenākāreṇa vartata iti durvyavasthāpanādasyāḥ sūkṣmatvaṃ veditavyam /
T06abhsubhu:577: draṣṭādigrahaṇena draṣṭā śrotā ghrātā svādayitā spraṣṭā vijñātā cetyeṣāṃ grahaṇaṃ veditavyam
T06abhsubhu:585: tatra rūpīti rūpaṃ tasya dharmasyātmasvabhāvastasmādasau rūpī, na tu rūpāntareṇa yuktatvāt
T06abhsubhu:588: 'pīti rūpāntarayogādapi rūpitvamiti darśayati, upādāyarūpasya bhūtarūpeṇa yogādbhatarūpāṇāṃ ca parasparamiti /
T06abhsubhu:590: samudayastadrūpi, na tu yathā vedanādīnāṃ pūrvikā ca nāndo samudayaḥ,
T06abhsubhu:597: dvayasamagocarataḥ sattvadvayasya samamālaṃ vanībhāvānna tvevamarūpiṇo yathātmānubhavaṃ paraiḥ parigrahītumaśakyatvāditi /
T06abhsubhu:602: vyābādhanataḥ pañcānāṃ skandhānāṃ pāṇyādisaṃsparśaiḥ śokādibhiśca yathāyogaṃ rūpaṇāt bādhanādityarthaḥ
T06abhsubhu:606: antarmukhato rūpāvacarasya rūpasya samāpatticittatṛṣṇāsaṃbhūtatvādata evāsya manomayatvaṃ veditavyam /
T06abhsubhu:619: vistareṇa rūpītyuktaṃ tathā sanidarśanatadātmato 'pi sanidarśanaṃ vistareṇa yojayitavyam /
T06abhsubhu:622: āvṛṇotītyetāvati vaktavye āvriyate ceti vacanaṃ prabhādirūpasya sapratighatvavyavasthāpanārtham
T06abhsubhu:623: taddhyāvriyata eva nāvṛṇotītyeṣā tasya jātireṣa svabhāva ityarthaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:625: yanna samādhivaśavarti rūpamiti samādhivaśena vartamānasyāpratighatvāt samacittakadevatāvata
T06abhsubhu:626: prakopapadasthānaṃ yatrāśraya ālaṃbane vā dveṣa utpadyate /
T06abhsubhu:640: trayāṇāṃ dhātūnāṃ dvayoścāyatanayoḥ pradeśaḥ saparivāramāryamārgamasaṃskṛtaṃ ca hitvā //
T06abhsubhu:642: yāvanti sāsravāṇi tāvanti saraṇāṇītyevamādi tadānubaṃdhyārthena veditavyam //
T06abhsubhu:650: kāmakāreṇa saṃmukhībhāvo vimukhībhāvaśca nāsaṃskṛtasya saṃbhavati nityatvāt /
T06abhsubhu:660: taccāsaṃskṛtaṃ ca sthāpayitvā trayāṇāṃ dhātūnāṃ dvayoścāyatanayoḥ pradeśo draṣṭavyaḥ //
T06abhsubhu:674: prabhāsvarotpannaṃ krīḍāpramoṣakāṇāṃ manaḥpradūṣakāṇāṃ nirmāṇaratīnāṃ paranirmitavaśavartināṃ rūpārūpyāvacarāṇāṃ ca devānāṃ pramodabāhulyādbhogeṣu vihāre ca svavaśavarttanādyathāyogam aprabhāsvarotpannaṃ tadanyat /
T06abhsubhu:678: pratibimbavibhutvanidarśanotpannaṃ jñeyaṃ vastu sabhāgaṃ vaimokṣikaṃ tāthāgataṃ ca rūpaṃ yathākramam
T06abhsubhu:694: svalakṣaṇasya vartamānasya pratyekaṃ pratiniyatasya viṣayasya grāhakaṃ pañcendriyajam /
T06abhsubhu:696: grāhakaṃ ṣaṣṭhendriyajam // pratyayasāmagrayā vijñānasyotpattimadhikṛtya prajñaptyāṃ grāhakopacāro veditavyaḥ, na tu bhūtārthena vyāpāratvād dharmāṇāmiti /
T06abhsubhu:697: yattāvadgrāhakaṃ grāhyamapi tat cakṣurādīnāmapi manovijñānena grāhyatvāt /
T06abhsubhu:704: daśānāṃ dhātūnāmiti saptānāṃ vijñānadhātūnāṃ rūpaśabdadharmadhātūnāṃ ca /
T06abhsubhu:713: hetau satyanutpannata ityasaṃskṛtādviśeṣaṇārtham, taddhayanutpannamapi sanna hetumaditi /
T06abhsubhu:730: ruciḥ saṃtiṣṭhata iti na kevalaṃ rucirevopapattiprātilambhikā kiṃ tarhi saha taiḥ śraddhādibhiriti
T06abhsubhu:731: kuśalasya bhāvanā sarve śrutamayādayaḥ kuśalā dharmāveditavyāḥ /
T06abhsubhu:735: tadanyaḥ kleśopakleśo duścaritasamutthāpaka iti sa punaryaḥ kāmā[va]caro
T06abhsubhu:739: kudṛṣṭipūrvakaṃ yatrānaśanādibhiḥ puṇyārthino varārthinaśca kliśyanta iti /
T06abhsubhu:741: sugatau tu paripūrakameva, yenātropapanno dāridrayādikaṃ vyasanaṃ pratyanubhavati /
T06abhsubhu:750: akliṣṭākuśalacetaso yadyasya (Abhidh-s-bh 28) na kliṣṭaṃ nāpi kuśalaṃ ceto bhavati, tata airyāpathikādyavyākṛtaṃ bhavatyanyathā kuśalākuśalaṃ yathāyogamiti /
T06abhsubhu:754: 'vyākṛtaṃ nirmāṇacittaṃ sahajāmiti yaiścittacaitasikaiḥ vikrīḍanārthaṃ nirmāṇaṃ nirmemīyate
T06abhsubhu:761: saha samādhilābhāt prahāṇābhirativipakṣabhūtasya dauṣṭhu[lya]sya prahāṇāt pradeśavairāgyamastīti veditavyam /
T06abhsubhu:776: satkāyavairāgyaṃ vā punaradhikṛtya śaikṣasyaikadeśavairāgyamaśaikṣasya sakalavairāgyaṃ veditavyam
T06abhsubhu:780: daśavairāgyāṇītyatra prātikūlyārtho vairāgyārtho veditavyo nāvaśyaṃ prahāṇārthaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:781: uccataraṃ sthānaṃ prāptavato nihīnesthāne ityuccataraṃ nagaraśraiṣṭhayādisthānaṃ prāptavato grāmamahattarādisthāne nihīne /
T06abhsubhu:782: bālānāṃ nirvāṇa iti tasya śāntatvājñānāt satkāyābhiṣvaṅgācca /
T06abhsubhu:783: pratilabdhadarśanamārgasya traidhātuka iti saṃskāraduḥkhatāṃ parijñātavataḥ sarvasāsrava[va]stunirvedāt
T06abhsubhu:784: prakṛtyā vairāgyaṃ prakṛtivairāgyaṃ yāvatprahāṇena vairāgyaṃ prahāṇavairāgyamiti padavigrahajātirveditavyā
T06abhsubhu:785: mokṣaprayuktasya kuśalaṃ śaikṣamiti saṃbhṛtasaṃbhārāvasthāyāḥ prabhṛtimokṣārtha prayuktasya veditavyam /
T06abhsubhu:793: śaikṣasya kliṣṭāvyākṛtamityatra kliṣṭamakuśalaṃ nivṛtāvyākṛtaṃ ca yathāsaṃbhavam /
T06abhsubhu:800: dṛṣṭisthānaṃ dṛṣṭisahabhuvo dharmāstadvījaṃ ca tathaiva vicikitsāsthānamapi veditavyam
T06abhsubhu:801: / ye ca dṛṣṭau vipratipannāḥ kleśopakleśā iti ye dṛṣṭimukhena pravṛttā
T06abhsubhu:804: darśanaprahātavyāviparyayeṇa sāsravā iti parikalpitakliṣṭadṛṣṭayādikādanye sāsravā ityarthaḥ
T06abhsubhu:805: atra punaḥ sāsravagrahaṇena nirvedhabhāgīyānāmapi grahaṇaṃ veditavyaṃ dauṣṭhulyānubandhārthena
T06abhsubhu:808: daśānāṃ [dhātūnāṃ caturṇā cāyatanānām (ekadeśa) iti] sa cā saṃskṛtaṃ ca /
T06abhsubhu:814: sati kevalaṃ pratyaye phalaṃ bhavati, na tu phalotpādanaṃ prati pratyayasya kācidīhetyarthaḥ
T06abhsubhu:815: asyotpādādidamutpadyate anityapratyayotpattitāmupādāya, na hyanutpādikāraṇāt kiṃcidutpadyamānaṃ kārya siddhamiti kṛtvā /
T06abhsubhu:816: avidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā ityevamādi samarthapratyayotpattitāmupādāya nirīhakatvānityatve 'pi sati na yataḥ kutaścit pratyayāt sarvameva
T06abhsubhu:819: yānyavidyādīni dvādaśāṅgāni vibhaktāni tānyeva punaḥ samasya catvāryaṅgāni bhavantyākṣepā ṅgādīni /
T06abhsubhu:820: etāvacca pravṛttinirdeśe nirdeṣṭavyam yaduta hetukāle yenākṣipyate yaccākṣipyate phalakāle yenābhinirvartyate yaccābhinirvatyate tadetatsarvamebhiraṅgainirdiṣṭaṃ veditavyam /
T06abhsubhu:821: tatra ākṣepakāṅgamavidyāsaṃskārā vijñānaṃ ca, anāgatajanmābhinirvṛttaye satyeṣvajñānapūrvakeṇa karmaṇā cittavāsanārthena /
T06abhsubhu:822: ākṣiptāṅgaṃ nāmarūpaṃ ṣaḍāyatanaṃ sparśo vedanā ca, tayā cittavāsanayā nāmarūpādīnā māyatyāṃ pūrvotarasaṃniśrayakrameṇābhinirvṛtaye bījapuṣṭitaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:823: abhinirvartakāṅgaṃ tṛṣṇā upādānaṃ bhavaśca, aprahīṇakāmādi tṛṣṇādivasena kāmādiṣu
T06abhsubhu:824: sucaritaduścaritaprakāraratipūrvakeṇa chandarāgeṇa sopādāne vijñāne sati maraṇāvasthāyāṃ phaladānaṃ prati chandarāgānurūpyāntarakarmavāsanābhimukhībhāvāt /
T06abhsubhu:825: abhinirvṛttyaṅgaṃ jātirjarāmaṇaṃ ca, tena prakāreṇa karmāntaravāsanābhimukhye
T06abhsubhu:830: na tvevaṃ jarāyujāyāṃ yonau vinā nāmarūpādibhiḥ ṣaḍāyatanādīnāṃ saṃbhava ityeṣāṃ pṛthagaṅgīkaraṇaṃ veditavyam //
T06abhsubhu:838: avidyā bhave sattvān saṃmohayati, tadāvṛtteḥ pūrvāntāparāntamadhyāntānāṃ yathābhūtāparijñānāt
T06abhsubhu:844: pratyayāśca bhavanti vijñānasya vāsanāyāḥ, āyatyā nāmarūpābhinirvṛttaye bījapoṣaṇāt /
T06abhsubhu:846: pratyayaśca bhavati nāmarūpasya, mātuḥ kukṣau vijñānāvakrāntyā nāmarūpavivṛddhigamanāt
T06abhsubhu:847: / nāmarūpamātmabhāvaṃ sattvān grāhayati tannivṛttyā sattvānāṃ nikāyasabhāgāntarabha janāt
T06abhsubhu:852: sparśo viṣayopabhoge sattvān pravartayati, tanmukhena sukhavedanīyāditrividhaviṣayopabhogāt
T06abhsubhu:861: upādānaṃ punarbhavādānāya sopādānaṃ ca sattvānāṃ vijñānaṃ karoti,
T06abhsubhu:864: bhavaḥ punarbhave sattvānabhimukhīkaroti, anantaragatyantarāvāhanāt pratyayaśca bhavati jāteḥ, tato nikāyasabhāgāntaranirvṛtteḥ /
T06abhsubhu:867: pratyayaśca bhavati jarāmaraṇasya, jātau satyāṃ tatprabandhasyānyathātvavināśasaṃbhavāt /
T06abhsubhu:868: jarāmaraṇaṃ punaḥpunarvayaḥ pariṇāmena jīvitapariṇāmena ca sattvān yojayati,
T06abhsubhu:889: antareṇa eva kartāraṃ karma kriyā cāsti tatphalopabhogaścetyayamatra karmaphalāvipraṇāśo veditavyaḥ
T06abhsubhu:893: nāsvayaṃkārāpa[ra]kārahetusamutpannaḥ hetupratyayānāṃ phalotpattau sāmarthyāt // aparaḥ paryāyaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:901: na svayaṃ na parato dvividhakoṭipratikṣepe 'pi gambhīraḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ syāt prāgeva yatra catasro 'pi koṭayaḥ pratikṣipyante,
T06abhsubhu:907: bāhyavasyotpattiprabhedato bījaṃ pratītyāṅkuraḥ, aṅkuraṃ pratītya kāṇḍaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:914: pratītyādhyātmaṃ ca yoniśo manaskāraṃ samyagdṛṣṭistato yāvatsarvāsravakṣaya iti /
T06abhsubhu:921: kasminnasati na jarāmaraṇaṃ bhavati kasya nirodhājjarāmaraṇanirodha iti pratilomanirdeśataḥ
T06abhsubhu:922: hetupratyaya ālayavijñānaṃ kuśalavāsanā ca sāsravānāsravāṇāṃ ca saṃskārāṇāṃ yathākramam /
T06abhsubhu:930: api khalu svabhāvato 'pītyevamādinā ṣaḍḍhetavo hetupratyaya iti darśayati
T06abhsubhu:957: tadyathā bhūtāni bhautikaṃ ceti yathāsaṃbhavaṃ na tvavaśyaṃ sarvatra saṃghāte catvāri mahābhūtāni bhavanti rūpādikaṃ vā bhautikam /
T06abhsubhu:958: ityato yadyatrāsti tattena sahotpadyate nānyonyaṃ vineti //
T06abhsubhu:962: yadyevaṃ saṃprayuktahetoḥ pṛthagvyavasthānaṃ na prāpnoti, cittacaitasikānāṃ sahabhūhetāvantarbhāvāt yadyapyetadevaṃ tathāpyanyenārthena /
T06abhsubhu:963: ye dharmāḥ sahabhāvenālaṃbanaṃ pratipadyante nānyatama vaikalyena te saṃpratipattitaḥ saṃprayuktakaheturvyavasthāpyate, na sahabhāvamātreṇa, tadyathā cittai caitasikāśca //
T06abhsubhu:965: yā aparānte uttarottarā puṣṭataratamā pravṛttiriti taiḥ paripoṣitabījānāṃ tadanvayānāmanāgate kāle viśiṣṭotpattito draṣṭavyā /
T06abhsubhu:967: sarvatragaheturna kevalaṃ sadṛśasyaiva puṣṭaye kiṃ tarhi yasya kasyacidrāgādeḥ kleśasyābhyāsena sarveṣāṃ dveṣādīnāṃ prabandhapuṣṭayā dṛḍhīkāro bhavatyato vandhanagāḍhīkaraṇānmokṣaprāptiparipanthārthenāsya vyavasthānaṃ veditavyam //
T06abhsubhu:972: itarathā hyacittikasamāpattau vyutthānacittasya samāpatticittaṃ na samanantarapratyayaḥ syāt
T06abhsubhu:974: tasmādekasmin saṃtāne paścimasya cittasya pūrvakaṃ cittaṃ cittāntareṇānantaritaṃ (Abhidh-s-bh
T06abhsubhu:977: sabhāgavisabhāgacittacaittotpattisama[na]ntarato 'pīti kuśalāḥ cittacettāḥ kuśalānāṃ sabhāgānāmakuśalāvyākṛtānāṃ ca visabhāgānāmanantarotpannānāṃ samanantarapratyayaḥ /

T06abhsubhu:1177: asaṃskṛtaikadeśaḥ niṣpannasvabhāvaḥ sottaramiti nirvāṇaṃ muktvā, tasya sarvadharmāgratvādiśuddhāyāśca tathatāyāstallakṣaṇatvāt //

T06abhsubhu:1192: jātisaṃgraheṇa skandhaiḥ rāśyādyarthayuktā rūpādayaḥ sarve saṃgṛhītā vilakṣaṇā apyanyonyaṃ svalakṣaṇenaikajātīyatvāt /

T06abhsubhu:1199: tathā dhātava āyatanāni ca saparivārāṇi pratyekaṃ sarvardhātubhirāyataneśca saṃgṛhītāni veditavyāni

T06abhsubhu:1299: vyayāṃśikī bhūtvābhāvaḥ, sa ca sukhapakṣyāṇāṃ saṃskārāṇāmanabhipretaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:1301: sadauṣṭhulyānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ prabandhenodayo 'pyanabhipretaḥ, vyayo 'pīti tadubhayāṃśikīmanityatāṃ pratītya saṃskāraduḥkhatā prajñāyate /

T06abhsubhu:1304: duḥkhasya tu veditasya duḥkhatvena prasiddhatvālloke na tatra punarabhisaṃdhirucyata iti /
T06abhsubhu:1305: yeṣu cānityeṣu saṃskāreṣu jātyādikaṃ prajñāyate [teṣām] anityatvāt duḥkhamityabhisaṃdhirveditavyaḥ
T06abhsubhu:1310: teṣāṃ ca saṃskārāṇāṃ nityakālaṃ tadrahitaprakṛtikalakṣaṇasya (Abhidh-s-bh 52) nairātmyasya bhāvastadubhayaṃ śūnyatetyucyate /
T06abhsubhu:1313: tasya yena yena prakāreṇa parikalpyate tena tena prakāreṇābhāvāt /
T06abhsubhu:1316: vināśādilakṣaṇānityatā prasiddhā, kṣaṇikalakṣaṇā tu na prasiddhā sarvasaṃskārāṇāmataḥ sā prasādhayitavyā
T06abhsubhu:1317: tatra cittacaitasikānāṃ kṣaṇikatvaṃ loke prasiddhamataḥ tenāprasiddhaṃ rūpasya kṣaṇikatvaṃ prasādhyate /
T06abhsubhu:1319: cittopāttatāmupādāya, kṣaṇikena hi cittena kāya upātta /
T06abhsubhu:1321: cittaikayogakṣematāmupādāya, tathāhi kāyaḥ savijñānaka eva samudāgacchati vijñānāpakrāntyā ca pūtībhavati /
T06abhsubhu:1323: kiṃ ca cittāśrayatāmupādāya, cittasya hi [vi]kāreṇa kāyasya vikāro dṛśyate
T06abhsubhu:1328: cittasya hi sendriyaḥ kāya āśrayaḥ prasiddhaḥ, yasya ca ya utpatyāśrayo nāsau svavināśamantareṇa tasyāśrayībhavandṛṣṭaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:1333: ataḥ kāraṇasya kṣaṇikatvātkāryasya kṣaṇikatvaṃ veditavyam, ye hetavo ye pratyayāḥ rūpasyātpādāya
T06abhsubhu:1334: 'pyanityāḥ, anityān khalu hetupratyayān pratītyotpannaṃ rūpaṃ kuto nityaṃ bhaviṣyatīti sūtrapadānusāreṇa
T06abhsubhu:1336: prabhāvaviśiṣṭasya ca cittasya (Abhidh-s-bh 53) rūpaṃ vaśe vartate, tena yatheṣṭaṃ pariṇāmāt
T06abhsubhu:1345: ataḥ pratyayāntaranirapekṣo 'vaśyaṃbhāvī vināśa utpannamātrasyaiva bhāvasya na bhavati paścādbhatīti
T06abhsubhu:1352: asti sarvabhūtikaḥ sa evārdra uṣṇaśca mṛtpiṇḍo gamanāvasthāyāmiti /
T06abhsubhu:1360: yadyatropalabhyate bhūtaṃ bhautikaṃ vā tatra tadastīti veditavyaṃ nānyatra /
T06abhsubhu:1363: buddhyā paryantabhedatastu paramāṇuvyavasthānaṃ buddhyā yāvānavayapāpakarṣaparyantaḥ śakyate prabhettuṃ tāvatā paramāṇuvyavasthānaṃ kriyate /
T06abhsubhu:1366: piṇḍasaṃjñāvibhā[va]natāmupādāya, avayavaśo hi buddhyā bhidyamāne rūpe sarvametadekaṃ rūpamiti piṇḍasaṃjñā vigacchati,
T06abhsubhu:1369: rūpadravyāpariniṣpattipraveśatāṃ copādāya, evaṃ hi buddhyā bhidyamānaṃ rūpaṃ na kiṃcidbhavatīti matvā rūpadravyasyāpariniṣpattiṃ praviśati, yato vijñaptimātrāvatāreṇa dharmanairātmyapraveśasyānukūlyaṃ bhavatīti //
T06abhsubhu:1371: sarvaduḥkhatāgatiyoniprabhāvitatvāt kāmadhātoranupacittakuśalamūlatvenānāvṛtaṃ sarvagatigamanatvācca yathākramaṃ tadvipulamasaṃlikhitaṃ ca veditavyam saṃlikhitaṃ tadevotpannamokṣabhāgīyānām, avaśyaṃ parinirvāṇaniyamāt /
T06abhsubhu:1380: paraṃ saptāhaṃ tiṣṭhatyantareṇa ca cyavate yadyupapattipratyayān labhate /

T06abhsubhu:1399: kleśāḥ kleśādhipateyaṃ ca karma iti sāsravamityarthaḥ /

T06abhsubhu:1422: dṛṣṭeḥ prañcākāro bhedaḥ - satkāyadṛṣṭirantagrāhadṛṣṭimithyādṛṣṭiḥ dṛṣṭiparāmarśaḥ śīlavrataparāmarśa iti //
T06abhsubhu:1425: sā punaḥ ṣaḍākārā tadyathā vikṣepāpraśāntatā viparyāsāpraśāntatā auddhatyāpraśāntatā styānamiddhāpraśāntatā pramādāpraśāntatālajjāpraśāntatā ca //
T06abhsubhu:1428: tatra cāyo niśomanaskāraḥ pratyavasthito bhavatīti tasminviṣaye śubhanimittādyudgrāhako rāgādyutpattyanukūlaḥ
T06abhsubhu:1429: avidyā dṛṣṭivicikitsā ūrdhvabhūmyālaṃbanā api santi na punarāsāṃ sā bhūmiḥ sākṣādālaṃbanaṃ veditavyaṃ yathā svabhūmiḥ, tatparikalpamukhapravṛttatvāt tu tadālaṃbanavyavasthānaṃ veditavyam tatrāvidyā ūrdhvabhūmyālaṃbanā yā dṛṣṭisaṃprayuktā /
T06abhsubhu:1430: dṛṣṭiḥ satkāyadṛṣṭi sthāpayitvā, na hi parabhūmikān
T06abhsubhu:1432: ūrdhvabhūmikasya tu kleśasyādhobhūmirālaṃbanaṃ na bhavati, tato vītarāgatvāt /
T06abhsubhu:1433: nirodhamārgālaṃbanasya tau nālaṃbanam, lokottareṇa jñānena tatpṛṣṭhalabdhena vā pratyātmavedanīyatvāt
T06abhsubhu:1434: tat parikalpitaṃ tvasyālaṃbanamiti vaktavye tatparikalpastvasyālaṃbanamiti vacanam,
T06abhsubhu:1436: rāgaḥ pratidhena na saṃ[pra]yujyate, ekāntaviruddhayorekatra vṛttyayogāt /
T06abhsubhu:1437: vicikitsayāpi na saṃ[pra]yujyate, na hi vicikitsāvyavasthitabuddhiradhyavasyatīti /
T06abhsubhu:1439: pratigho mānena dṛṣṭyā ca na saṃprayujyate, na hi yo yatra vastuni pratihatastena sa unnatiṃ gacchati tadvā saṃtīrayituṃ śaknotīti, evamanyadapi yojayitavyam //
T06abhsubhu:1440: krodhādaya anyonyaṃ na saṃprayujyanta iti viruddhā viruddhairna
T06abhsubhu:1446: evaṃ styānādayaḥ sarvatra kliṣṭe yojayitavyāḥ, akarmaṇyādikamantareṇa kliṣṭatvā saṃbhavāditi
T06abhsubhu:1447: yadyena prakāreṇa yasmin vastuni saṃprayojayati tannirdeśena saṃyojananirdeśo veditavyaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:1457: dṛṣṭisaṃyojanena saṃprayukto mithyāni saraṇaṃ paryeṣata ityaha mokṣo mama mokṣo muktaśca nityo bhaviṣyāsyucchetsyāmi veti, na ca bauddhānāmasti mokṣa iti /
T06abhsubhu:1459: kalpayatyabhiniviśate, āryāṣṭāṅgaṃ mārgaṃ hitvā satkāyadṛṣṭayā tatpūrvakeṇa ca śīlavratena śuddhipratyayanāt //
T06abhsubhu:1461: bāhyena hi bandhanena baddho dvayaṃ na labhate
T06abhsubhu:1462: - gantuṃ ca na labhate, āsīno 'pi yatheṣṭamabhipretaceṣṭāyāṃ kāmakāraṃ na
T06abhsubhu:1465: kāmaiṣaṇāyā aviratasya kāmarāgapratighānuśayāvanuśayā te, tanmukhena tayoḥ puṣṭigamanāt
T06abhsubhu:1466: mithyā mokṣaṃ mokṣopāyaṃ ca santīrayantīti yathākramaṃ tisṛbhirdṛṣṭibhirdvābhyāṃ ca parāmarśābhyāṃ yathā saṃyojaneṣūktamiti //
T06abhsubhu:1468: ṣaḍ rāgādīn kleśān sthāpayitvā tadanyaḥ kliṣṭaścaitasikaḥ saṃskāraskandhaḥ krodhādiko veditavyaḥ
T06abhsubhu:1469: kuśalapakṣāntarāyāya yogināṃ punaḥpunarudvegena cittaṃ paryavanahyantīti paryavasthānāni /
T06abhsubhu:1470: kuśalapakṣaḥ punaryathākālaṃ śamathapragrahopekṣānimittabhāvanā tatsaṃniśrayaśca brahmacaryādiśuddhisaṃgṛhītaṃ śīlam /
T06abhsubhu:1471: tatra śamathakāle styānamiddhamantarāyaṃ karoti, ādhyātmaṃ saṃkṣepāvāhanāt /
T06abhsubhu:1481: ātmavādopādāne[na] tvanyonyaṃ na vivadanti, ātmano 'stitvaṃ prati sarveṣāṃ matasāmyāt /
T06abhsubhu:1484: abhidhyādayaḥ kāyagranthā iti na rūpakāyasyaite granthā veditavyāḥ kiṃtarhi samāhitacittasvabhāvasya kāyasya parigranthārthena granthāḥ /
T06abhsubhu:1485: pṛthagdṛṣṭisaṃniśrayeṇedameva satyaṃ moghamanyadityabhiniviśya jñeyaṃ saṃtīrayatāmayoniśo jñeyasaṃtīraṇahetoḥ cittaṃ vikṣipyate /
T06abhsubhu:1488: kuśalapakṣasyāsaṃprakhyānāya cittaṃ nivṛṇvantīti nivaraṇāni kuśalapravṛtterantarāyaṃ kurvantītyarthaḥ
T06abhsubhu:1489: kāmacchandaṃ pravrajyābhiraterantarāyaṃ karoti, viṣayopabhogābhilāṣamukhena tatra tatrābhiramaṇāt
T06abhsubhu:1498: punaḥ punaḥ saṃsāre jātijarāmaraṇayogena nidhnantīti nighāḥ //
T06abhsubhu:1505: mithyādharmābhiniveśahetoḥ viparītadarśino mohena duścaritaṃ caranti yājñikādaya iti //
T06abhsubhu:1508: ayoniśonimittamanuvyañjanaṃ ca grāhayitvā kāyaṃ cittaṃ ca paridahantīti paridāhāḥ //
T06abhsubhu:1509: rūpādike vastuni ratyadhyavasānaṃ kārayitvā tadvipariṇāme śokādibhiḥ sattvānāyāsantītyu pāyāsāḥ
T06abhsubhu:1520: rāgo viṣaye dṛṣṭau ca vipratipanna iti bhāvanāprahātavyo darśanaprahātavyaśca yathākramam
T06abhsubhu:1522: sattveṣu rāgaḥ so 'pi viṣayamukhenaiva vipratipanno veditavyaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:1523: evaṃ pratikūlamātrālaṃbanatvāt pratighasya sattveṣvapi pravartamāno viṣayamukhenaiva vipratipanno veditavyaḥ // mānaḥ sattveṣu dṛṣṭau ca
T06abhsubhu:1526: śīlavrataparāmarśādiḥ dṛṣṭau vipratipannaḥ dṛṣṭidoṣeṇaiva śīlavratasya śuddhitaḥ parāmarśanāt
T06abhsubhu:1533: viparītakalpanataśca nirodhe mārge ca vipratipannā draṣṭavyāḥ, tīrthyairanyathā parikalpya tatra [vi]pratipatteḥ
T06abhsubhu:1538: pratigho duḥkhena saṃprayujyate pañcavijñānakāyikaḥ, ṣaṣṭho daurmanasyena,
T06abhsubhu:1539: sarva upekṣayā pūrvavat sukhasaumanasyābhyāṃ na saṃprayujyate,
T06abhsubhu:1541: mānaḥ kāmadhatau sukhena na saṃprayujyate, pañcavijñānakāyikābhāvāt /
T06abhsubhu:1546: yā parivṛttāśrayasya parivṛttivijñānāśritā cittatuṣṭiḥ cittaudvilyaṃ cittaharṣaḥ cittakalpatā sātaṃ veditaṃ vedanāgatam /
T06abhsubhu:1548: yatparivṛttāśrayasyālayavijñānāśrita āśrayānugrahata āśrayahlādaḥ sātaṃ veditaṃ vedanāgatamiti /" tadetaduktaṃ bhavati /
T06abhsubhu:1549: sukhā vedanā prathamadvitīyayordhyānayorutpadyamānā yena cittacaitakalāpena saṃprayujyate taṃ ca harṣākāreṇa prīṇayati, āśrayaṃ cālayavijñānasvabhāvaṃ prasrabdhisukhena hlādayati atastadubhayakṛtyakaratvādubhayathaivāsyā vyavasthānaṃ veditavyaṃ prītiḥ sukhaṃ ceti /
T06abhsubhu:1550: tasmāttayā saṃprayujyamāno mānaḥ sukhena saumanasyena ca saṃprayujyata ityucyate /
T06abhsubhu:1551: mithyādṛṣṭiḥ kāmadhātau daurmanasyena saumanasyena ca saṃprayujyate,
T06abhsubhu:1553: sukhaduḥkhābhyāṃ na saṃprayujyate, manobhūmikatvāt sarvasyā dṛṣṭeḥ //
T06abhsubhu:1554: vicikitsā kāmadhātau saumanasyena na saṃprayujyate, aniścitacittasya nairvṛttyamantareṇa saumanasyābhāvāt
T06abhsubhu:1555: rūpadhātau vicikitsottaradhyāyināmapi prītisukhaṃ samādhivalādhānenānuvartata eveti tatra sukhasaumanasyābhyāmapi saṃprayujyate //
T06abhsubhu:1556: āveṇikāyā apyavidyāyā eṣa eva nayo draṣṭavyaḥ sukhasaumanasyābhyāṃ saṃprayogāsaṃprayogamārabhya
T06abhsubhu:1562: kāmadhatau daśa dukhadarśanaprahātavyā iti ye tatra tannidānapadasthānato vipratipannāḥ /
T06abhsubhu:1563: evaṃ samudayādiṣu yathāyogaṃ vipratipannāstaddarśanaprahātavyā iti veditavyāḥ /
T06abhsubhu:1564: kiṃ khalu ye yadālaṃbanāste tatra (Abhidh-s-bh 62) vipratipannā iti veditavyāḥ /
T06abhsubhu:1570: yathoktam - "nāhamāyuṣmandāsakemān pañcopādānaskandhānātmata [ā]tmīyato vā samanupaśyāmyapi tvasti me eṣu pañcasūpādānaskandheṣvasmīti māno 'smīti
T06abhsubhu:1572: yathā kliṣṭasya dhātrīcailasyoṣādibhiḥ sudhautasya nirmalasyāpi satastadadhivāsanākṛtaṃ gandhamātramanuvartate yattatsugandhadravyaparibhāvanayā bhūyo 'pyapanetavyaṃ bhavatyevameva darśanamārgeṇa prahīṇaparikalpitasatkāyadṛṣṭimalasyāpyāryaśrāvakasya
T06abhsubhu:1574: antagrāhadṛṣṭiḥ sahajocchedadṛṣṭisaṃgṛhītā veditavyā, yayā nirvāṇāt pratyudāvartate
T06abhsubhu:1578: svabhāvaparijñānaṃ kleśa eṣa utpannaḥ cittasaṃkleśātmaka iti /
T06abhsubhu:1579: ādīnavaparijñānamātmāvyāvādhāya saṃvartate paravyābādhāyobhayavyā[bā]dhāya, dṛṣṭadhāmikamavadyaṃ prasavati sāṃparāyikaṃ dṛṣṭadharmasāṃparāyikamavadyaṃ prasavati tajjaṃ caitasikaṃ duḥkhadaurmanasyaṃ pratisaṃvedayata ityevaṃ tribhiḥ prakāraiḥ parijñāyotpannaḥ kleśo 'nadhivāsanayogena parivarjyate anutpannasya tvanutpādāya mārgo bhāvyate //
T06abhsubhu:1581: yadi sarvadharmā anātmana iti nairātmyajñānenaiva kleśaprahāṇaṃ bhavatyanityādyākārāḥ kimarthamupadiśyante
T06abhsubhu:1588: tatra jñānānuttaryaṃ nairātmyajñānam, tataḥ pareṇa jñānāntarāparyeṣaṇā[t] /
T06abhsubhu:1591: etāni ca trīṇyānuttaryāṇi yathākramaṃ darśanabhāvanāniṣṭhāmārgānadhikṛtya veditavyāni //
T06abhsubhu:1593: kāritrakarma pṛthivyādīnāṃ dhāraṇādi yadvā yasya svalakṣaṇakṛtyam /
T06abhsubhu:1598: asmiṃstvarthe yadbhūyasyā vyavasā karmābhipretamiti prāptikāritrakarmaṇorapi saṃbhavāt //
T06abhsubhu:1599: kāyādikarma karmapathā iti sūtrānusāreṇa yathāpradhānaṃ nirdeśo
T06abhsubhu:1601: trayaścatvārastrayaśca karmapathā yathākramaṃ kāyavāṅmanaḥkarmalakṣaṇā veditavyāḥ // prāṇātipātādīnāṃ vastu sattvasaṃkhyātamasattvasaṃkhyātaṃ vā yathāyogaṃ yadadhiṣṭhāya prāṇātipātādayaḥ pravartante āśayastatra vastuni tatsaṃjñāśayastatkarmapathakriyecchāśayaśca /
T06abhsubhu:1604: niṣṭhāgamanaṃ tena tena prayogeṇa tasya tasya karmaṇaḥ paripūraṇaṃ tatkālamūrdhvakālaṃ vā // tatra prāṇātipātasya vastu sattvaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:1608: niṣṭhāgamanaṃ tasya prāṇinastena prayogeṇānantaraṃ praścādvā maraṇam // adattādānādonāṃ vastu ca niṣṭhāgamanaṃ ca nirdhekṣyāmaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:1612: kāmamithyācārasya vastvagamyā strī gamyā vānaṅgādeśākāle vamātrāyuktābhyāṃ ca sarvaśca pumānnapuṃsakaṃ ca /
T06abhsubhu:1614: mṛṣāvādasya vastu dṛṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ mataṃ vijñātamadṛṣṭamaśrutamamatamavijñātaṃ ca /
T06abhsubhu:1636: parasaṃjñaptisaṃcetanīyatā yathā kaścidanicchanniva paraiḥ saṃjñāpyamānaḥ samādāpyamāno hitametaditi grāhyamāṇo 'bhisaṃghāyā kuśalamācarati /
T06abhsubhu:1640: tatra pūrvikābhistisṛbhiḥ saṃcetanīyatābhiḥ kṛtamapi karma naivopacīyate yato
T06abhsubhu:1642: paścimābhyāṃ tu saṃcetanīyābhyāṃ yadi kṛtaṃ bhavatyupacitaṃ cāvaśyamevāsya vipākaḥ pratisaṃvedyate
T06abhsubhu:1645: yadasmin janmanyanenedaṃ karma karaṇīyamiti sa tamavadhimalaṃghayitvā tatkarma karoti, yasyākaraṇāya pratibandhaṃ buddhā api bhagavanto na
T06abhsubhu:1649: yathānena vipākena dṛṣṭe dharme bhavitavyamanenopapadyānenāparasmin paryāya iti //
T06abhsubhu:1651: akuśalānāṃ karmapathānāṃ mṛdumadhyādhi mātrāṇāṃ vipākaphalaṃ tiryakpretanarakeṣu veditavyam
T06abhsubhu:1654: adhipatiphalaṃ pratyekaṃ tadānurūpyeṇaiva bāhyānāṃ bhāvānāṃ [sa]syādīnāṃ vipattiḥ /
T06abhsubhu:1684: yathākuśalānāṃ karmapathānāṃ vipākaphalādi triphalā vasthānaṃ kṛtam, evaṃ kuśalādīnāṃ karmapathānāṃ sāsravāṇāṃ devamanuṣyeṣu trīṇi phalāni yathāyogaṃ yojayitavyāni //
T06abhsubhu:1689: anekenaikamākṣipati, bahubhiḥ karmakṣaṇaiḥ tasyaivaikasya punaḥ punaḥ bījapoṣaṇāt /
T06abhsubhu:1692: yathā kāmāvacaramanyagatikamapi paripūrakaṃ kuśalamūlamanyatra vipākaṃ prayacchati, naivaṃ rūpyārūpyāvacaram, bhūminaiyamyena phaladānāt /
T06abhsubhu:1698: tatra saṃmohaḥ kuśalacittānāmapyadṛṣṭasatyānāmanuśayato 'nubuddho bhavati yadvaśena te
T06abhsubhu:1709: tadyadi tenaiva vittopakaraṇenārthī bhava[ti] tatsvīkaraṇāyābhisaṃskarotyato 'sya lobhena prayogo vyavasthāpyate /
T06abhsubhu:1711: atha parasvīkaraṇe na kaściddoṣa iti mohena prayogo veditavyaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:1713: anyonyādhipateyamapi karma sādhāraṇaṃ veditavyaṃ yadvaśātsattvā anyonyaṃ citacaittapariṇāmanimittaṃ bhavantīti //
T06abhsubhu:1716: sarvaṃ ca kuśalaṃ karma saṃcetanīyaṃ pratipakṣabalikasyākuśalād balavaddraṣṭavyam /
T06abhsubhu:1718: sarvaṃ cāviśeṣeṇa kuśalākuśalaṃ niyatavipākamārya mārgeṇāprahīṇaṃ balavadityucyate /
T06abhsubhu:1730: tadyathā kṣetrato yadi guṇavaddakṣiṇīyaṃ kṣetraṃ bhavati /
T06abhsubhu:1731: vastuno yadi praṇītaṃ prabhūtaṃ deyavastu bhavati /
T06abhsubhu:1733: āśrayataḥ puṇyānāṃ kartā yadi vītarāgo bhavati /
T06abhsubhu:1737: bahulīkārataḥ yadi paunaḥ punyena kṛtaṃ bhavatyanuvitarkitaṃ vā /
T06abhsubhu:1738: bāhujanyato yadi svayaṃ ca kṛtaṃ bhavatyanyaiśca kāritamiti //
T06abhsubhu:1739: ya evaṃ vadet - yathā yathāyaṃ puruṣapudgalaḥ karma karotyupacinoti tathā
T06abhsubhu:1740: tathā vipākaṃ pratisaṃvedayata ityevaṃ sati brahmacaryavāso na bhavatyavakāśaśca (Abhidh-s-bh 68) na prajñāyate samyagduḥkhakṣayāya
T06abhsubhu:1744: yadi tadvipākastathaiva sahaduḥkhena sahadaurmanasyenānubhūyeta vṛthā tatparipālanaṃ syāt
T06abhsubhu:1745: pāradārikaprabhṛtīnāṃ ca sahasukhena sahasaumanasyena dauḥśīlyakaraṇādyadi tadvipākastathaivānubhūyeta vṛthā tadviratiḥ syādityevaṃ kṛtvā brahmacaryavāso na bhavati // kathamavakāśaśca na prajñāyate
T06abhsubhu:1748: evaṃ ca kṛtvā sukhasahagatasya karmaṇaḥ sukhasahagata eva vipāko duḥkhasahagatasya duḥkhasahagato
T06abhsubhu:1749: 'duḥkhāsukhasahagatasya tatsahagata eveti niyamaḥ pratiṣiddhaḥ // atra yastvevaṃ yathāvedanīyaṃ yathāvedanīyamityevamādinā sukhasahagatasya kuśalākuśalasya yathāyogamāyatyāṃ sukhaduḥkhāduḥkhāsukhavedanīyasya
T06abhsubhu:1751: evaṃ duḥkhāduḥkhāsukhasahagatasya sukhādivedanīyasya sukhādiko vipāko 'nujñāyata iti //
T06abhsubhu:1752: pravrajitasya saṃvaraḥ pañcavidho bhikṣusaṃvaro yāvacchāmaṇerīsaṃvara iti
T06abhsubhu:1753: / sa duścaritavivekacaritaṃ kāmavivekacaritaṃ ca pudgalamadhikṛtya vyavasthāpitaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:1754: tathāhi sa tādṛśaḥ śaknoti yāvajjīvaṃ prāṇātipātāda brahmacaryācca virantumiti /
T06abhsubhu:1755: upāsakopāsikāsaṃvaro duścaritaviveka caritamadhikṛtya no tu kāmavivekacaritam /
T06abhsubhu:1756: ataḥ evāsya yāvajjīvaṃ kāmamithyā cāraviratirvyavasthāpyate nābrahmacaryaviratiriti /
T06abhsubhu:1762: dhyānasaṃvaro dauḥśīlyasamutthāpakānāṃ lobhādīnāṃ kāmāvacarāṇāṃ kleśopakleśānāṃ viṣkambhaṇapratipakṣeṇa bījopaghāte sati pradeśavairāgyeṇāpi kāmebhyo vītarāgasya yā tasmādauḥśīlyādviratiḥ /
T06abhsubhu:1763: yāvattṛtīyadhyānavītarāgasya dūrībhāvapratipakṣeṇa teṣāmeva dauḥśīlyasamutthāpakānāṃ sutarāṃ bījopaghāto veditavyaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:1766: aurabhrikā ye paśūn hatvā tadvikrayeṇa jīvikāṃ kalpayanti /
T06abhsubhu:1771: abhijanmato vā tatkarmasamādānato veti tatkulīnasyānyakulīnasya ca yathākramam /
T06abhsubhu:1773: yathoktasaṃvarāsaṃvaravinirmuktasya dānapriyavacanādikaṃ khaṭacapeṭādikaṃ ca karma navasaṃvaronāsaṃvara ityucyate //
T06abhsubhu:1774: dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ karma yatra janmani kṛtaṃ tatraiva yadvipacyate /
T06abhsubhu:1775: upapadyavedanīyaṃ yadanantare janmani, tadyathā pañcānantaryāṇi karmāṇi /
