T06abhsubhu:2206: punarbodhipakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ pañcabhiḥ prakāraiḥ vyavasthānaṃ veditavyam
T06abhsubhu:2208: tatra smṛtyupasthānānāmālaṃbanaṃ yathākramaṃ kāyo vedanā cittaṃ dharmāḥ /
T06abhsubhu:2211: (Abhidh-s-bh 85) bālāḥ prāyeṇa sendriyaṃ kāyamāśritya sukhādimupabhuñjānā upalabdhalakṣaṇā ātmarāgādibhiḥ śraddhādibhiśca saṃkliśyante vyavadāyante ceti vikalpayantyata āditaḥ samyaktadvastulakṣaṇaparīkṣārthamevaṃ caturdhālambanavyavasthānaṃ veditavyam //
T06abhsubhu:2212: svabhāvataḥ prajñā smṛtiśca, kāyādyanupaśyanāvacanāt smṛtyupasthānavacanācca yathākramam //
T06abhsubhu:2221: pārasaṃtānikāni cādhyātmikāni rūpīṇyāyatanānyadhyātmabahirdhā kāyaḥ, āyatanavyavasthāṃ saṃtānavyavasthāṃ ca pramāṇayitvā //
T06abhsubhu:2222: kāye kāyasya sādṛśyena paśyanā kāye kāyānupaśyanā,
T06abhsubhu:2224: adhyātmaṃ vedanādayo 'dhyātmaṃ kāyamupādāyotpannāḥ cakṣurādyālaṃbanatayā svāśrayotpannanatayā vā /
T06abhsubhu:2232: alpamātrasaṃtuṣṭiḥ alaṃ me tāvatā kuśalapakṣeṇeti prativāraṇam /
T06abhsubhu:2243: tathāhi tatpratipakṣabhūtā prasrabdhiḥ kāya eva viśeṣeṇotpadyata iti /
T06abhsubhu:2247: nirodhasatyamavatarati, nirātmakaṃ vijñānamātraṃ na bhaviṣyatīti paśyata ātmocchedāśaṅkāmukhena nirvāṇottrāsābhāvāt /
T06abhsubhu:2259: yadā śamathādinimittamanaskāreṇa nirapekṣālaṃbanaṃ kevalaṃ pratipakṣaṃ bhāvayati tadā vyāyaccjhata ityucyate /
T06abhsubhu:2260: yadā tulayopakleśe utpanne tadapakarṣaṇārtha prasadanīyādimanaskāraiḥ cittamunnāmayati, (Abhidh-s-bh
T06abhsubhu:2261: 87) auddhatyopakleśe cotpanne pratyāsaṃkṣepamukhena cittaṃ dhārayati tadā
T06abhsubhu:2270: chandasamādhiryat satkṛtyaprayogamāgamya spṛśati cittasyaikāgratāṃ tīvreṇa chandena tīvreṇādareṇa prayogaḥ satkṛtyaprayoga iti kṛtvā /
T06abhsubhu:2272: tadvīryamityucyate yannityaṃ prayujyata eva na kadācinna prayujyate /
T06abhsubhu:2273: cittasamādhiryatpūrvajanmāntare samādhibhāvanāmāgamyatatparipuṣṭabījatvāccittasya svarasena samādhyanukūlapariṇāme sati spṛśati cittasyaikāgratām /
T06abhsubhu:2274: api khalu ṛddhipādābhinirhārayornidarśanārthameva samyakprahāṇabhāvanāyāṃ chandaṃ janayatītyevamādinirdeśo veditavyaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:2275: cittaṃ pradadhāti pragṛhṇātītyeṣā cātra pāṭhānupūrvī veditavyā /
T06abhsubhu:2276: tatra cittasamādhiryaccitaṃ pradadhat spṛśatīti pratyātmaṃ cittameva cittaṃ dhārayan śamayannabhisaṃkṣipannadhigacchatītyarthaḥ
T06abhsubhu:2282: tathāhi yo yenārthī bhavati tatprāptyartha vyāyacchate /
T06abhsubhu:2298: etacca yathā kramamadhikṛtyoktaṃ bhagavatā - naca me chando 'tilīno bhaviṣyati,
T06abhsubhu:2299: nātipragṛhītaḥ, nādhyātmaṃ saṃkṣiptaḥ na bahirdhā vikṣiptaḥ,
T06abhsubhu:2300: paścātpūrvasaṃjñī bhaviṣyati ūrdhvamadhaḥsaṃjñī ca, vivṛtena cetasāparyavanaddhena saprabhāsasahagataṃ cittaṃ bhāvayiṣyāmi na ca me 'ndhakārāyattatvaṃ bhaviṣyati cetasa iti /
T06abhsubhu:2303: satyābhisamayaprayogasaṃgṛhītatvena tadākāratvāt // phalaṃ tadādhipatyādacireṇa kālena darśanamārgasyotpādaḥ tasminneva ca kāle nirvedhabhāgīyabhajanaṃ ca saṃtānasya //
T06abhsubhu:2305: tathāhyeṣāṃ tacca yathoktam - āśradvyādivipakṣanirlekhaścādhika ityata evaiṣāṃ
T06abhsubhu:2315: tatra prasrabdhyā na saṃkliśyate, tayā dauṣṭhulyasrāvaṇāt /
T06abhsubhu:2318: bhāvanā smṛtisaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ bhāvayati vivekaniśritamityevamādirebhiḥ caturbhiḥ padairyathākramaṃ catuḥsatyālaṃbanā bodhyaṅgabhāvanā paridīpitā
T06abhsubhu:2319: / tathāhi duḥkhaṃ duḥkhata ālaṃbamānasya tadvivekānveṣaṇādduḥkhālaṃbanaṃ vivekaniśritamityucyate
T06abhsubhu:2320: tṛṣṇālakṣaṇaṃ duḥkhasamudayaṃ duḥkhasamudayata ālaṃbamānasya tadvirāgānveṣaṇāttadālaṃbanaṃ virāganiśritam /
T06abhsubhu:2322: duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipad vyavasarga ityucyate, tayā duḥkhavisarjanāt /
T06abhsubhu:2326: mārgāṅgānāmālaṃbanaṃ darśanamārgāduttarakālaṃ saiva yathādṛṣṭānāṃ satyānāṃ yathābhūtatā /
T06abhsubhu:2328: tatra samyagdṛṣṭiḥ paricchedāṅgam, tayā yathānubhavaṃ tattvāvadhāraṇāt /
T06abhsubhu:2334: samyakkarmāntenābhikramapratikramādiṣu saṃpannacāritratayā śīlaviśuddhiḥ samyagājīvena yathānujñaṃ dharmeṇa cīvarādiparyeṣaṇādājīvaviśuddhiriti /
T06abhsubhu:2340: bhāvanā bodhyaṅgavat, tadyathā samyagdṛṣṭiṃ bhāvayati vivekaniśritāmiti vistaraḥ /
T06abhsubhu:2342: pratipadāṃ dharmapadānāṃ ca pūrvavadarthanirdeśo veditavyaḥ dukhā pratipadanāgamyārūpyaniśritā yathākramaṃ śamathavipaśyanāmāndhāt /
T06abhsubhu:2347: tasya cittasyaivamādita upanibaddhasya calasyaudārikasya tasminnevālaṃbane saṃtatiyogena sūkṣmīkaraṇena cābhisaṃkṣepaḥ saṃsthāpanā /
T06abhsubhu:2350: pūrvameva vikṣepanimitteṣu rūpādiṣvādīnavasaṃjñāmadhipati kṛtvā cittasya prasarādānaṃ damanam
T06abhsubhu:2356: tatra caritaviśodhanamālaṃbanaṃ kauśalyālaṃbanaṃ vā kleśaviśodhanaṃ vā yāvadbhāvikatayā (Abhidh-s-bh 91) vicinoti, yathāvadbhāvikatayā
T06abhsubhu:2359: api khalu [śamatha]vipaśyanāmāgamya catvāro mārgā iti catvāro mārgopadeśanāmadhikṛtya /
T06abhsubhu:2360: tatra prathamaḥ śamathasya lābhitvādabhiniṣīdanneva cittaṃ sthāpayati yāvatsamādhatte, vipaśyānāyā alābhitvāttu samādhiṃ niśritya paścāttathāniṣaṇṇastān dharmānvicinoti
T06abhsubhu:2364: kathaṃ kṛtvā, śrutodgrahaṇamukhena vivaśyanāyāṃ yogaṃ karoti tatpūrvakaṃ ca śamathe /
T06abhsubhu:2366: ajñātamājñāsyāmīndriyaṃ prayogamārge nirvedhabhāgīyasaṃgṛhīte pañcadaśasu ca darśanamārgacittakṣaṇeṣu yadindriyam, tadyathā manaindriyam, pañca
T06abhsubhu:2383: saṃniviṣṭānādikālānusṛtā, yāsāvucyate prapañcavāsaneti, yataścakṣurādayo dharmāḥ sanāmābhiniveśāḥ punaḥ punaḥ pravartanta iti /
T06abhsubhu:2408: yathoktaṃ - "tasya cetovimukteḥ pāripūryā prajñāvimukteḥ pāripūryā kāyadauṣṭhulyānāṃ pratiprasrabdheḥ
T06abhsubhu:2409: smṛtyā samanvāgamahetorevamasya prathamaṃ dvāraṃ sudāntaṃ bhavati suguptaṃ surakṣitaṃ susaṃvṛtaṃ subhāṣitam, yaduta cakṣurvijñeyeṣu rūpeṣvevaṃ
T06abhsubhu:2412: sa ca samādhirnirantarastatpravāharaya laukikena mārge ṇāntarākhaṇḍanāt /
T06abhsubhu:2424: yadā tu nirhatāśeṣavipakṣo bhavati traidhātukavairāgyāttadāsya mārgasvabhāvasyāśrayasya paripūrṇā parivṛttirvyavasthāpyate /
T06abhsubhu:2426: kṣaye sati, viṣaye vā tasmin yajjñānaṃ kṣayajñānametaduktaṃ bhavati /
T06abhsubhu:2427: niravaśeṣaṃ prakṣīṇe samudaye yajjñānaṃ tadavasthasya hetunirodhālaṃbanaṃ vā kṣayajñānamiti
T06abhsubhu:2428: tathānutpāde sati viṣaye vā tasmin yajjñānamanutpādajñānam āyatyāṃ sarvasya duḥkhasyātyantamanutpattidharmatāyāṃ satyāṃ yajjñānamanyasatyālaṃbanamiti /
T06abhsubhu:2443: tatra laukikā jñeye 'praviṣṭāḥ sāvaraṇāḥ savikalpāśca, tathatāyā aprativedhāt kleśānuśayitvādabhilāpamukhena prapañcanācca yathākramam /
T06abhsubhu:2444: viparyayeṇa lokottarāḥ supraviṣṭā nirāvaraṇāśca santo nirvikalpatayā laukikebhyo viśiṣyante
T06abhsubhu:2446: yasmādeteṣu vartamāno 'nityārtha paśyati sākṣādanubhavati, na tvanityamiti paśyatyabhilāpaprapañcamukheneti
T06abhsubhu:2452: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ tathāgatastamabhipretamartha vivṛtyaiva na deśayatītyāha daśānuśaṃsān saṃpaśyaṃstathāgataḥ sūcanākāreṇa dharmaṃ deśayati /
T06abhsubhu:2456: sukhaṃ deśayati, alpena mahato 'rthavistarasya pratyāyanāt, tadyathā sthāpayati saṃsthāpayatītyevamādi
T06abhsubhu:2459: paripūrayati, bhāvagamyo 'yaṃ dharma ityavagamya jātāsthasya tasmin dharme ādaramukhena śraddhādisaṃbhāraparipūraṇāt /
T06abhsubhu:2462: ratneṣvavetya prasādaṃ pratilabhate, deśanāyāḥ suvyavasthitabhāvagamena daiśikādiṣvabhiprasādotpādāt
T06abhsubhu:2464: abhiprāyārtha tīvreṇa yogena cintayitvā labdhavataḥ prāmodyaviśeṣādhigamāt
T06abhsubhu:2465: / sāṃkathyaviniścayena satāṃ cittamārādhayati, gūḍhārthavivaraṇāt, ata eva paṇḍitaḥ paṇḍita iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati, yaśo 'sya
T06abhsubhu:2470: udānaṃ yadāttamanaskenodāhṛtam tadyathā yadā ime prādurbhavanti dharmā ityevamādi //
T06abhsubhu:2471: nidānaṃ yatkiṃcideva pudgalamuddiśya bhāṣitaṃ sotpattikaśikṣā prajñaptikabhāṣitaṃ vā, tadyathāsminnidāne 'smin prakaraṇa iti vistaraḥ //
T06abhsubhu:2494: punaḥ sūtrapiṭakaṃ niśritya vineyāḥ śikṣātraye vyutpadyante, tatra tasya vistareṇodbhāvitatvāt
T06abhsubhu:2497: / abhidharmaniśrityādhiprajñaṃ śikṣāṃ niṣpādayanti, tatra vistareṇa dharmapravicayopāyopadeśāditi ato 'pi piṭakatrayavyavasthānam //
T06abhsubhu:2501: abhidharmaṃ niśritya parasparaṃ sāṃkathyaviniścayakṛtena dharmasaṃbhogena sparśavihāro bhavati, tatra bahuprakāraṃ dharmāṇāṃ svalakṣaṇādidharmatāyā vyutpādanāt //
T06abhsubhu:2503: śrāvakayānādhikāreṇa yāni sthavirānandenodgṛhītāni // kiṃ punarekasya dharmaskandha[sya] parimāṇam /
T06abhsubhu:2510: śataṃ sahasrāṇāṃ śatasahasram, śataṃ śatasahasrāṇāṃ koṭirityevaṃ
T06abhsubhu:2512: ata ete eva samasya daśaśatānyeko dharmaskandho vyavasthāpyate /
T06abhsubhu:2513: anayā ca gaṇanayā caturaśītidharmaskandhasahasrāṇyaṣṭau koṭyaḥ catvāriśacca lakṣā bhavanti sa eṣa piṭakatrayasaṃgṛhīto dharmaḥ kasya gocaraḥ /
T06abhsubhu:2523: 'sāvucyate parato ghoṣata iti tata uttarakālaṃ smṛtirāśrayo
T06abhsubhu:2531: yāvadbhāvikatayā dharmāṇāmetāvanti sarvadharmavastuni yajjñeyavyavasthānam tadyathā skandhadhātvāyatanāni
T06abhsubhu:2533: tadyathā satyamukhena tānyeva skandhadhātvāyatanāni yathāsaṃbhavaṃ duḥkhatojñeyāni yāvanmārgataḥ ākāramukhenaikaikaṃ satyaṃ caturbhirākārairjñeyam, aviśeṣataśca sarvāṇi tathatākāreṇa /
T06abhsubhu:2534: dharmoddānādhikāreṇa vānityataḥ sarvasaṃskārā jñeyā yāvacchāntato nirvāṇam /
T06abhsubhu:2538: yathāvadbhāvikatāyā nirdaśe ṣoḍaśaprakārā uktāstrayaśca vimokṣākārāḥ teṣāṃ cānyonyasaṃgrahaḥ
T06abhsubhu:2545: avidyādayo dharmāḥ saṃskārādīndharmānabhiṣyandayanti, na hyeṣāṃ nirhetuka
T06abhsubhu:2548: satyanurūpāddhetoranurūpasyaiva phalasyotpattiḥ, tadyathā sucaritasyeṣṭo vipāko duścaritasyāniṣṭa ityevamādi yajjñānamidaṃ sthānāsthānakauśalyaṃ veditavyam //
T06abhsubhu:2561: dharmatāyuktistadyathāgninā dāhaḥ, udakena kleda ityevamādikā prasiddhā dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā
T06abhsubhu:2562: yathoktaṃ cakṣuḥ samṛddhaṃ śūnyaṃ nityena yāvadātmīyena /
T06abhsubhu:2565: nāmaparyeṣaṇā nāmakāyādīnāṃ prajñaptisattvādapariniṣpannameṣāṃ svalakṣaṇamiti yā vicāraṇā
T06abhsubhu:2566: vastuparyeṣaṇā skandhādīnāṃ tathāpariniṣpattiryathā nāmakāyādibhirabhilapyanta iti yā saṃtīraṇā parīkṣaṇetyarthaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:2570: tathāhi vyutpannavyavahārasyābhidhānamātraṃ śrutvā tadabhidheye saṃpratyaya utpadyate smṛtimukhena, abhidheyaṃ vā punarupalabhya tadabhidhāne /
T06abhsubhu:2571: ityevaṃvidhe saṃbandhe prasiddhe cakṣurityevamādisvalakṣaṇaprajñaptimātraṃ tadākhyāmāsapiṇḍādivyavahārasya nimittaṃ bhavatīti yā parīkṣeyamucyate svabhāvaprajñaptiparyeṣaṇā /
T06abhsubhu:2576: tatra ādhāro yādṛśaṃ bāhuśrutyaṃ śamathavipaśyanayoḥ pratiṣṭhā bhavatyālaṃbanayogena tadādhāra ityucyate /
T06abhsubhu:2578: ādhānaṃ tadālaṃbano yoniśomanaskāraḥ, tena tasmin bāhuśrutye 'viparītārthacittākāreṇa cittākaraṇāt
T06abhsubhu:2583: kathaṃ ca punaḥ bodhisattva ekasyāṃ yaugabhūmau prayukto nopalambhaṃ spṛśati saṃbhṛtapuṇyajñāna saṃbhāro bodhisattvaḥ kalpāsaṃkhyeyaniryātastathāprativedhānukūlaṃ śrutaṃ yoniśomanasikurvan samādhiṃ niṣpādayati /
T06abhsubhu:2586: saṃpaśyaṃstasmin pratibimbe viṣayasaṃjñāṃ vyāvartya tadākāraṃ svasaṃjñāmātramavadhārayati
T06abhsubhu:2587: tadā cāsau svacittamātrāvasthānādadhyātma sthitacitto bhavan sarvathā grāhyabhāvaṃ prativedayate
T06abhsubhu:2588: tataśca grāhyābhāvādgrāhakamapi na pariniṣpannamiti tasyāpyabhāvaṃ parivedayate /
T06abhsubhu:2590: / etadeva cādhikṛtyoktaṃ bhagavatā pratibimbaṃ manaḥ paśyanniti vistaraḥ /
T06abhsubhu:2592: sā ceyaṃ yogabhūmirhetutaḥ phalataśca nirdiṣṭā veditavyā /
T06abhsubhu:2595: yaduktaṃ sthavirānandena - pañcabhirāyuṣmañchāriputradharmaiḥ samanvāgato bhikṣurlaghu ca gṛhṇātītyatra sūtre taireva pañcabhirdharmairlaghugrahaṇādīni catvāri yathāyogaṃ veditavyāni catvāri kathaṃ kṛtvā /
T06abhsubhu:2601: pūrvāntāparāntānusaṃdhikuśala udgṛhītaṃ na nāśayati, pūrvamudgahītāndharmānniśritya paścānniḥsartavyamiti buddhābhisaṃdhijñatvādadhigamena tatsārādānataḥ //
T06abhsubhu:2602: dharmavihārī bhikṣurdharmavihāri bhikṣuriti bhadantocyata ityatra sūtre bhagavatā samastena śrutacintābhāvanāvihāreṇa dharmavihāro bhavati,
T06abhsubhu:2604: tatra paryāptisvādhyāyadeśanābahulā vitarkaṇā bahulāścetyanena kevalaṃ śrutacintāprayuktā na bhāvanāprayuktā yogādiriñcanādato [na]
T06abhsubhu:2606: yo 'pi kaścicchrutacintāmanāgamya kevalaṃ bhāvanāprayuktaḥ syātso 'pi na dharmavihārī vyavasthāpyate
T06abhsubhu:2607: tata eva tāvaddharmavihāriṇaṃ bhikṣumārabhya iha tu bhikṣurddharmaṃ paryāpnoti sūtraṃ geyamiti vistareṇoktvā paścādāha na riñcati yogamityevamādi, yathā vijñāyeta śrutaṃ cintāṃ bhāvanāṃ cāgamya tadubhayavihāreṇa dharmavihārīti /
T06abhsubhu:2608: na riñcati yogamityevamādinā samādhiprayogāsaṃtuṣṭibhyāṃ bhāvanāmayaṃ saṃdarśitam /
T06abhsubhu:2609: samādhiprayogaḥ (Abhidh-s-bh 102) punardvividhaḥ saṃdarśitaḥ sātatyasatkṛtyaprayogasaṃgṛhītaśca na riñcati yogamityanena,
T06abhsubhu:2615: tatra saṃkhyā dvividhā, gaṇanāsaṃkhyā tanmātrasaṃkhyā ca /
T06abhsubhu:2617: sarvākārayorvodhisattvābhyudayaniḥśreyasamārgayostisṛbhistisṛbhiśca saṃgrahāt ṣaḍevapāramitā na bhūyasyo nālpoyasya itīyaṃ tanmātrasaṃkhyā //
T06abhsubhu:2624: sattvaparipācanopāyaḥ, buddhadharmasamudānayanopāyaśca, eṣāmanyatareṇāpi vinā bodhisattvasya niḥśreyasānupapatteḥ /
T06abhsubhu:2646: yadbodhisattvasya bodhisattvadharmatāyāṃ vyavasthitasya bodhicittaṃ niśritya karuṇāpuraḥsareṇa cetasā sarvāstiparityāge kāyavāṅmanaskarma /
T06abhsubhu:2647: evaṃ ca kṛtvā dānapāramitāyāḥ lakṣaṇaṃ gotrataḥ praṇidhānata āśayato vastutaḥ svabhāvataśca nirdiṣṭaṃ veditavyam /
T06abhsubhu:2648: tadyathā bodhisattvadharmatā gotram, bodhicittaṃ praṇidhānam, karuṇāpuraḥsaraṃ ceta āśayaḥ,
T06abhsubhu:2652: śīlakṣāntivīryapāramitāsu yathākramaṃ sarvasaṃvarasamādānānurakṣāyāṃ sarvāpakāraduḥkhamarṣaṇādhivāsanāyāṃ sarvakuśaladharmasamudānayanatāyāṃ yatkāyavāṅmanaskarmeti veditavyam /
T06abhsubhu:2657: punaryaddānaṃ sarvajñatāmārabhya sarvajñatāyai saṃvartate sarvajñatāṃ parigṛhṇāti sarvajñatākṛtyaṃ ca karoti taddānapārimitetyucyate /
T06abhsubhu:2658: etāni punaścatvāri padāni yathākramamārambhato vāsanātaḥ kāyato nisyandataśca veditavyāni
T06abhsubhu:2660: tadeva punardānaṃ saṃtati vāsayate, yata āyatyāṃ sarvajñatāyai saṃvartate /
T06abhsubhu:2661: tadeva yadā paripūrṇaṃ bhavati tadā dharmakāyapariniṣpādanayogena sarvajñatāṃ parigṛhṇāti
T06abhsubhu:2665: uttarottarasaṃniśrayatāmupādāya dānapāramitayādhyātmikabāhyasarvavastuparityāgābhyāsātkāyajīvitanirapekṣo bodhisattvo mahāntamapi bhogaskandhaṃ prahāya śīlasamādānaṃ karoti /
T06abhsubhu:2666: śīlānurakṣī - ākruṣṭena mayā na pratyākroṣṭavyam - ityevamādibhiḥ prakāraiḥ kṣamo bhavati
T06abhsubhu:2669: saṃpannadhyānaśca samāhitacitto yathābhūtajñānāllokottarāṃ prajñāṃ pratilabhata iti //
T06abhsubhu:2670: punaruttarottarādhārataḥ, śīlaṃ dānasyādhāra evaṃ yāvatprajñā dhyānasya /
T06abhsubhu:2671: tathāhi śīlavato dānaṃ viśuddhaṃ bhavati, dānenānugṛhītasya śīlena paghātākaraṇataḥ /
T06abhsubhu:2678: bahuprakārāndharmānvipaśyatyadhyātmaṃ śamathataḥ samādhyabhivṛddheḥ, nāsti dhyānamaprajñasyeti gāthāyāṃ vacanāditi //
T06abhsubhu:2682: sarvasūkṣmā tu prajñā, ataḥ sarvapaścādvyavasthāpyata iti //
T06abhsubhu:2710: niṣpattiparamatvaṃ daśamyāṃ bhūmau tāthāgatyāṃ ca bodhisattvapariniṣpattyā buddhapariniṣpattyā ceti //
T06abhsubhu:2711: punaḥ paramairīhitā itāśceti pāramitāḥ, buddhabodhisattvaiśceṣṭitā gatāścetyarthaḥ //
T06abhsubhu:2713: punaḥ parānātmānaṃ ca paramāmīti tārayantoti pāramitāḥ, parānātmānaṃ ca duḥkhārṇavamatikrāmantītyarthaḥ // idaṃ tāvatsādhāraṇaṃ nirvacanam //
T06abhsubhu:2714: pratyekaṃ punardāyakadāridrayāpanayatāddānam, dāhāpanayanādvā pratigrāhakānām // śāntendriyālambhanācchubhagatilīyanācchaityālayācca śīlaṃ yathākramamindriyeṣu guptadvāratāvāhanāt sugatigamanahetubhāvanādavipratisārādyānupūrvyā yāvannirvāṇāśrayatvāditi /
T06abhsubhu:2716: kṣaticittaṃ punaryenāpa kāriṇāṃ pratyapakāraḥ kriyate tasyāgatasyānayā vilopanaṃ tiraskaraṇaṃ veditavyam /
T06abhsubhu:2717: kṣatameṣāṃ vairaṃ vidyata iti kṣatinasteṣāmabhayaprakāśanaṃ kṣemasyāviṣkaraṇaṃ veditavyam
T06abhsubhu:2720: samyakprahāṇābhyām, vṛddhaye īhā kuśaladharmasamudāgamāya dvābhyāṃ samyakprahāṇābhyāṃ ca /
T06abhsubhu:2722: tatra dhāraṇāmālaṃbane cittasya, yamanaṃ vikṣepataḥ, saṃyamanaṃ cittasya,
T06abhsubhu:2723: vinayanaṃ paryavasthānānāṃ viṣkambhaṇam, nayanaṃ vibhutvasya prāpaṇaṃ
T06abhsubhu:2726: tatra parapraṇītajñānaṃ parato ghoṣānvayā yoniśomanaskārasaṃprayuktā prajñā,
T06abhsubhu:2728: śamaprāptaye jñānaṃ bhāvanāmārge kleśapratipakṣabhūtā, guṇaprakarṣāya jñānaṃ vaiśeṣikaguṇābhinirhārāya prajñā veditavyā //
T06abhsubhu:2731: hetusaṃniśritā yo gotrabalena pāramitāsu pratipattyabhyāsaḥ vipākasaṃniśritā ya ātmabhāvasaṃpattibalena
T06abhsubhu:2739: āśayasaṃniśritā pāramitābhāvanā ṣaḍākārā - atṛptāśayena vaipulyāśayena muditāśayenopakarāśayena nirlepāśayena kalyāṇāśayena ca /
T06abhsubhu:2740: tatra bodhisattvasya dāne 'tṛptāśayo yadbodhisattvasyaikakṣaṇe gaṅgānadīvālikāsamānlokadhātūn saptaratnaparipūrṇān pratipādayato gaṅgānadīvālikāsamāṃścātmabhāvanevaṃ pratikṣaṇaṃ gaṅgānadīvālikāsamān kalpān pratipādayataḥ /
T06abhsubhu:2741: yathā caikasattvasyaivaṃ yāvān sattvadhāturanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau paripācitavyaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:2742: tamanena paryāyeṇa pratipādayedatṛpta eva bodhisattvasya dānāśaya iti /
T06abhsubhu:2744: na ca bodhisattva evaṃrūpāṃ dānaparaṃparāṃ kṣaṇamātramapi hāpayati vicchinattyābodhimaṇḍaniṣadanāditi
T06abhsubhu:2745: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya dāne vipulāśayaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:2746: muditataraśca bodhisattvo (Abhidh-s-bh 107) bhavati tānsattvāṃstathā dānenānugṛhṇan, na ca te sattvāstena dānenānugṛhyamāṇā iti /
T06abhsubhu:2747: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya dāne muditāśayaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:2748: upakaratarāṃśca bodhisattvastān sattvānātmanaḥ samanupaśyati yeṣāṃ tathā dānenopakaroti nātmānam,
T06abhsubhu:2750: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya dāne upakarāśayaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:2751: na ca bodhisattvaḥ sattveṣu tathā vipulamapi dānamayaṃ puṇyamabhisaṃskṛtya pratikāreṇa vārthī bhavati vipākena veti /
T06abhsubhu:2754: yadbodhisattvastathā vipulasyāpi dānaskandhasya vipākaṃ sattveṣvevābhinandati nātmanaḥ,
T06abhsubhu:2756: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya dānapāramitābhāvanāyāṃ kalyāṇāśayaḥ
T06abhsubhu:2759: sarvopakaraṇanirantaravighātī trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātāvāgniparipūrṇe caturvidhamīryāpathaṃ kalpayannekaṃ śīlapāramitākṣaṇaṃ yāvatprajñāpāramitākṣaṇaṃ bhāvayet, etena paryāyeṇa yāvacchīlaskandho yāvatprajñāskandho yenānuttarāṃ
T06abhsubhu:2765: yadbodhisattvastāṃ śīlapāramitābhāvanāparaṃparāṃ yāvatprajñāpāramitābhāvanāparaṃparamā bodhimaṇḍaniṣadanānna bhraṃśayati na vicchinattīti /
T06abhsubhu:2766: ya evaṃrūpa āśāyo 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya śīlapāramitābhāvanāyāṃ yāvatprajñāpāramitābhāvanāyāṃ vipulāśayaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:2767: muditataraśca bodhisattvo bhavati tayā śīlapāramitābhāvanayā yāvatprajñāpāramitābhāvanayā sattvānanugṛhṇan, na tveva te sattvā anugṛhyamāṇā iti /
T06abhsubhu:2768: ya evaṃrūpaāśayo 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya śīlapāramitābhāvanāyāṃ yāvatprajñāpāramitābhāvanāyāṃ muditāśayaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:2769: upakaratarāṃśca sa bodhisattvastān sattvānātmanaḥ samanupaśyati yeṣāṃ tathā śīlapāramitābhāvanayā yāvatprajñāpāramitābhāvanayā upakarāti
T06abhsubhu:2771: ya evarūpa āśayo 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya śīlapāramitābhāvanāyāṃ yāvatprajñāpāramitābhāvanāyāmupakarāśayaḥ
T06abhsubhu:2772: na ca bodhisattvastathā vipulamapi śīlapāramitāmayaṃ yāvatprajñāpāramitāmayaṃ puṇyamabhisaṃskṛtya tasya pratikāreṇa (Abhidh-s-bh 108) vārthī bhavati vipākena veti /
T06abhsubhu:2773: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya śīlapāramitāyāṃ yāvatprajñāpāramitāyāṃ
T06abhsubhu:2775: tatra yadbodhisattva evaṃ śīlapāramitābhāvanāmayasya yāvatprajñāpāramitābhāvanāmayasya puṇyaskandhasya vipākaṃ sattveṣvevābhinandati nātmanaḥ, sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ ca kṛtvānuttarāyāṃ
T06abhsubhu:2777: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya śīlapāramitāyāṃ bhāvanāyāṃ yāvatprajñāpāramitābhāvanāyāṃ kalyāṇāśayaḥ //
T06abhsubhu:2783: tatra kāyavibhutvaṃ tāthāgatau dvau kāyau draṣṭavyau svābhāvikaḥ sāṃbhogikaśca /
T06abhsubhu:2784: tatra caryāvibhutvaṃ nairmāṇikaḥ kāyo draṣṭavyo yena sarvākārāṃ sarvasattvānāṃ sahadhārmikacaryāṃ darśayati /
T06abhsubhu:2795: pratyekaṃ dānādīnāṃ traivighyāt tribhistribhirupastambhairyathākramaṃ saṃgraho veditavyaḥ
T06abhsubhu:2796: tatra trividhaṃ dānam - abhayadānaṃ dharmadānamāmiṣadānaṃ ca /
T06abhsubhu:2797: trividhaṃ śīlam - saṃvaraśīlaṃ kuśaladharmasaṃgrāhakaṃ śīlaṃ sattvārthakriyāśīlaṃ ca /
T06abhsubhu:2801: trividhaṃ vīryam - saṃnāhavīryaṃ prayogavīryaṃ sattvārthakriyāvīryaṃ ca /
T06abhsubhu:2802: trividhaṃ dhyānam - dṛṣṭadharmasukhāvihārāya dhyānamabhijñānirhārāya dhyānaṃ sattvārthakriyāyai ca dhyānam /
T06abhsubhu:2803: trividhā prajñā - saṃvṛtyālaṃbanā paramārthālaṃbanā sattvārthālambanā ca //
T06abhsubhu:2805: abhayadānaṃ cittopastambhaḥ daurmanasyaviśeṣā[pa]gamāya cetasa āśvāsāya saṃhārāt /
T06abhsubhu:2809: kuśalamūlākṣayatā sarvasattveṣu kriyārthādhikāritayā yāvatsāraṃ nirupadhiśeṣe 'pi nirvāṇadhātāvaparityāgaḥ, tadupastambhaḥ sattvārthakriyāyaṃ vīryaṃ veditavyam //
T06abhsubhu:2810: gaṇaparikarṣaṇaṃ karmaṃ adhigamaṃ niśritya vineyānāmasamāhitasya cittasya samādhānāya samāhitasya vā cittasya vimokṣāyāvavādānuśāsanopradānam,
T06abhsubhu:2815: punaḥ prabhedaḥ sapta dānāmi - mūladānaṃ gotrāvasthasya bodhisattvasya
T06abhsubhu:2823: prabhāvāvasthasya, vinā vāhyenopakaraṇaparigraheṇa gaganagañjādisamādhibhirākāśe pāṇiṃ saṃcārya yatheṣṭaṃ ratnādivarṣaṇāt /
T06abhsubhu:2837: tadanena viśiṣṭena cittotpādena pāramitānāṃ saṃgraho veditavyaḥ, tāsāṃ kāraṇabhāvāt /
T06abhsubhu:2838: svaparārthasaṃgraho yaddānenaiśvarya parigṛhaṇātyayaṃ svārthaḥ, yatpunaḥ parānupakaraṇopasaṃhāreṇānugṛhṇātyayaṃ svārthaḥ evamavaśiṣṭābhiḥ saṃgraho veditavyaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:2846: ityevaṃ tathatāsamyajjñānasvabhāvataḥ paramārtho dānādibhiḥ saṃgṛhīto veditavyaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:2848: vipakṣo dānādīnāṃ yathākramaṃ mātsaryadauḥśīlye krodhakauśīdye vikṣepadauḥprajñe /
T06abhsubhu:2849: api khalu yāvantaḥ kuśalā dharmāḥ pāramitābhiḥ saṃgṛhītāsteṣāṃ yo vipakṣo jñeyāvaraṇaṃ ca sa tāsāṃ vipakṣo veditavyaḥ //
T06abhsubhu:2855: mahābhogatā sugatigamanamavarābhedasukhasaumanasya bahulatā sattvādhipapatyamavyābādhyātmabhāvatā maheśākhyatā ca yathākramaṃ dānādīnāṃ vipākaphalaṃ veditavyam //
T06abhsubhu:2862: tatraiva yā maitracittasya paratravighātotpīḍāviheṭhasaṃvaraṇatā sā śīlapāramitā /
T06abhsubhu:2864: tatraiva yā bhūyo bhūyaścittasyotsahanatā sā vīryapāramitā /
T06abhsubhu:2865: tatraiva yā cittasyaikāgratā kuśalādbahiravisaraṇatā sā dhyānapāramitā /
T06abhsubhu:2866: tatraiva yā yathāvaddhetu phalasugṛhītatā dṛṣṭyaparāmarṣaṇatā sā prajñāpāramitā /
T06abhsubhu:2867: evaṃ yāvatprajñāpāramitāyāṃ yathāyogaṃ yojayitavyamubhayadānaṃ sarvajñajñānamiti kṛtvā //
T06abhsubhu:2869: tatra dānādīnāṃ svabhāvo yathākramaṃ visargaḥ saṃvaro marṣaṇābhyutsāhaścitasthitiḥ pravicayaśca
T06abhsubhu:2871: tatra dānādīnāmupayogaḥ samādāpanā varṇavāditā sumanojñatā ca /
T06abhsubhu:2872: tatra dānādīnāṃ ropaṇā yā parasaṃtāne pratiṣṭhāpanā /
T06abhsubhu:2876: tadyathā yā dānapāramitā śīlapāramitāpi sā, yā vā śīlapāramitā dānapāramitāpi sā, paścātpādakaḥ
T06abhsubhu:2877: yā yāvacchīlapāramitā dānapāramitāpi sā, syāddānapāramitā na śīlapāramitā
T06abhsubhu:2880: yaddānaṃ sarvā sā pāramitā, yā dānapāramitā sarvaṃ taddānamiti catuṣkoṭikam /
T06abhsubhu:2882: syāt pāramitā na dānaṃ śīlādayo mahābodhipariṇāmitāḥ /
T06abhsubhu:2885: syānna dānaṃ na pāramitā uktavinirmuktā dharmāḥ /
T06abhsubhu:2887: yo dānaṃ samācarati sarvo 'sau dānapāramitānvayaṃ puṇyaṃ prasavatīti catuṣkoṭikam /
T06abhsubhu:2894: viśeṣato vaipulye audāryagāmbhīryadeśanā tatphalasya sarvajñatvasya paramodāragambhīratvātphalānurūpyeṇa hetunirdeśo draṣṭavyaḥ //
T06abhsubhu:2895: ekatyānāṃ tadanadhimokṣe trāsaḥ bodhisattvagotravaikalyaṃ prakṛtyā hīnacittatayā gāmbhīryaudāryadeśanāṃ nādhimoktuṃ śaknuvanti /
T06abhsubhu:2898: adhimucyamānānāmapyekatyānāmaniryāṇaṃ nītārtha sūtrama[na]nviṣya svayaṃ dṛṣṭiparāmarṣasthāyitayā yathārutamarthābhiniveśāta /
T06abhsubhu:2900: evamanye 'pi yathārutārthābhiniveśino mahāyāne na niryāntotiveditavyaṃ nānābhiprāyabhāṣitatvāt mahāyānasyeti /
T06abhsubhu:2901: idaṃ ca saṃdhāyoktaṃ bhagavatā mahādharmādarśe dharmaparyāye - bodhisattvasya yathārutamayoniśo
T06abhsubhu:2905: tatra nisvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmā anutpannā ityevamādikaṃ mahāyāne rutamupalabhya tadabhisaṃdhyakuśalāḥ yathārutamevāsyārthamadhimucyamānā abhāva evāyaṃ bhagavatā deśitaḥ sarvadharmāṇāmanutpāda evetyabhāvādinimittamabhiniviśante saiṣāṃ bhavati nimittadṛṣṭiḥ /
T06abhsubhu:2906: ta evamabhāvādinimittamabhiniviśamānāstrīnsvabhāvānavadante parikalpitaṃ svabhāvaṃ paratantraṃ pariniṣpannaṃ ca /
T06abhsubhu:2907: tatrāyaṃ parikalpitaḥ svabhāvo yadrūpamiti vā yāvannirvāṇāmiti vābhilāpaprajñaptimātrabhabhūto niḥśarīrārtho yadbālā rūpādilakṣaṇaṃ samāropattaḥ parikalpayanti /
T06abhsubhu:2909: tatrāyaṃ pariniṣpannaḥ svabhāvo yatsarvadharmāṇāṃ tattvaṃ (Abhidh-s-bh 113) tathatā
T06abhsubhu:2911: ta evaṃ sarvathā sarvadharmānapavadamānāstasyā apavādadṛṣṭeḥ pratiṣṭhāpanārthaṃ kāṃcideva yuktiṃ parigṛhṇanti, ye 'pi nītārthāḥ sūtrāntā nirabhilāpadharmatādyotakāstānapi sarvān svadṛṣṭayānulomyena pariṇāmayanti
T06abhsubhu:2912: / te eva dve dṛṣṭo bhavataḥ parigrahadṛṣṭiḥ pariṇatidṛṣṭiśca /
T06abhsubhu:2913: te punarevaṃdṛṣṭayo bhavanti - ya etāmīdṛśīṃ dṛṣṭiṃ niśritya kuśalamakuśalaṃ vā samācarati sa niravadya eva bhavati nirdoṣaḥ sarvamevāsya tatkalyāṇatāṃ
T06abhsubhu:2914: yāti, pūrvopacitāccāvaraṇātsa niḥsaratotyevameṣāṃ dve dṛṣṭī anavadyatādṛṣṭirniḥsaraṇadṛṣṭiśca
T06abhsubhu:2915: te caivaṃ svadṛṣṭāvabhiniviṣṭāstad dṛṣṭiviparyayeṇa skandhādidharmavyavasthāpakaṃ śrāvakapiṭakamavajānanti,
T06abhsubhu:2917: te ete dve dṛṣṭī bhavato 'vajñādṛṣṭiḥ prakopadṛṣṭiśca /
T06abhsubhu:2918: svadṛṣṭyanusāreṇa caite yathāvacchūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāni vyavasthāpayamānā atallakṣaṇe tallakṣaṇasaṃjñino viparītameṣāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ vyavasthāpayanti, evaṃcittāśca bhavanti - yasyāmīdṛśyāṃ dharmatāyāmavatarantyavatārayanti vā sarve te 'prameyaṃ puṇyaṃ prasavantītyevamete dṛṣṭī viparītadṛṣṭiḥ prasavadṛṣṭiśca yadā punaste tāṃ dṛṣṭimārabhya paraṃranuyujyante tadā na
T06abhsubhu:2921: te caivamabhimānino bhavanti - ya evaṃ pratipadyante [te] samyagbuddhān bhagavataḥ pūjayanti
T06abhsubhu:2923: aviparītadharmatākuśalaiśca tatā dṛṣṭervivecyamānāḥ sūpapannayā prasiddhayā yuktayā pratyāyamānā api tāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ na kathaṃcit parityajanti, etadeva tathyaṃ mithyānyadityeṣā
T06abhsubhu:2925: etāsāṃ ca yathānirdiṣṭānāṃ dṛṣṭīnāṃ yadvāsanādauṣṭhulyaṃ sā mūladṛṣṭiḥ /
T06abhsubhu:2926: eta eva ca saptadaśadṛṣṭayo doṣodbhāvanāmukhenāvaśiṣṭābhiḥ dṛṣṭibhiḥ punarnidiśyante /
T06abhsubhu:2927: tadyathā dṛṣṭāvadṛṣṭadṛṣṭi nimittadṛṣṭirityucyate, abhāvādinimittābhiniveśina eva sataḥ sarvanimittānabhiniveśasajñitvāt /
T06abhsubhu:2939: anabhyupagamadṛṣṭiḥ kusṛtidṛṣṭiśca nigrāhyadṛṣṭiḥ, [a]nyāyena vādaṃ kurvato jayāsaṃbhavāt
T06abhsubhu:2945: ata evānantaraṃ tatraiva sūtra uktamitīmāḥ saptadaśa samānāḥ daśa bhavanti, daśa samānāḥ saptadaśa
T06abhsubhu:2946: bhavanti, saptaviṃśatiḥ samānā ekā bhavati, ekā samānā saptaviṃśatirbhavantīti //
T06abhsubhu:2949: yena vā svabhāvenaite pūrvamabhūvanna tena svena bhāvena bhūyaḥ śakyamebhirbhavitumiti niḥsvabhāvāḥ
T06abhsubhu:2952: yādṛśo vādṛṣṭasatyairdharmāṇāṃ svabhāvo lakṣaṇamabhilāpaprapañcavāsanāmukhena gṛhyate tena bālagrāhānurūpeṇa svabhāvena vi[ra]hitatvānniḥ svabhāvāḥ //
T06abhsubhu:2953: api khalu sarvadharmā ucyante trayaḥ svabhāvāḥ /
T06abhsubhu:2954: tatra parikalpitasya svalakṣaṇameva nāstyataḥ svalakṣaṇaniḥsvabhāvatayā niḥsvabhāvaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:2955: paratantrasya svayamutpattirnāsti pratyayāpekṣaṇādato nāsya svena bhāvena bhāva ityutpattiniḥ svabhāvatayā niḥsvabhāvaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:2956: pariniṣpanno viśuddhyālaṃbanatvāt paratantraparikalpitalakṣaṇābhāvasvabhāvatvācca paramārthaścaiṣa niḥsvabhāvatāprabhāvitaśceti paramārthaniḥsvabhāvatayā niḥsvabhāvaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:2957: ityevaṃ ca kṛtvā niḥsvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmā draṣṭavyāḥ, na tu sarvathālakṣaṇābhāvamadhikṛtyeti
T06abhsubhu:2958: api khalu mahāyāne tathāgatasya sarve 'bhiprāyāḥ saṃkṣepeṇa catvāro bhavanti /
T06abhsubhu:2959: tadyathā samatābhiprāyo yadāha - ahameva tasmin samaye vipaśyī
T06abhsubhu:2961: kālāntarābhiprāyoyadāha - ye sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau praṇidhānaṃ kariṣyanti te tatropa patsyanta iti, vimalacandraprabhavasya ca nāmadheyagrahaṇamātreṇa niyato bhavatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāviti,
T06abhsubhu:2963: arthāntarābhiprāyo yadāha - niḥsvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmā anutpannā ityevamādi, ayathārutārthatvāt
T06abhsubhu:2964: pudgalāśayābhiprāyo yattadeva kuśalamūlaṃ kasyacitpraśaṃsanti kasyacidvigarha te
T06abhsubhu:2968: kaukṛtyenāvṛtasya ye buddhabodhisattveṣvapakāramapi kariṣyanti te sarve svargopagā bhaviṣyantītyāha
T06abhsubhu:2970: vyākaroti, ekaṃ ca yānaṃ na dvitīyamastīti deśayati
T06abhsubhu:2982: kleśena ca susaṃkliṣṭā labhante bodhimuttamām // iti /
T06abhsubhu:2983: atrāyamabhisaṃdhiḥ - avikṣepe yeṣāṃ sārabuddhiḥ pradhānabuddhiḥ, vikṣepo hi visāraścetasaḥ viparyāse ca susthitāḥ iti nityasukhaśucyātmaviparyayeṇānityādike viparyāse ca susthitā aparihāṇitaḥ
T06abhsubhu:2984: kleśena ca susaṃkliṣṭāḥ iti dīrghaduṣkara vyāyāmaśrameṇātyartha parikliṣṭāḥ //
T06abhsubhu:2985: vaipulye dharmasamādhikuśalabodhisattvanirdeśaḥ śamathānuśaṃsaṃ vipaśyanānuśaṃsaṃ tadubhayānuśaṃsaṃ cādhikṛtya veditavyaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:2987: kṣaṇe kṣaṇe prakarṣagāminyā prasrabdhyā nirantaramāśrayaspharaṇāt pratikṣaṇaṃ sarvadauṣṭhulyāśraya
T06abhsubhu:2992: 'pramāṇaḥ sūtrādidharmeṣu prajñāvabhāsaḥ, āśrayaparivṛttipūrvarūpabhūtānāṃ cāvikalpitānāmanabhisaṃskṛtānāṃ nimittānāṃ samudācāraśca /
T06abhsubhu:2993: tadubhayānuśaṃso dharmakāyasya jñeyāvaraṇa prahāṇāśrayaparivṛttisaṃgṛhītasya paripūraye daśamyāṃ bhūmau pariniṣpattaye vā tāthāgatyāṃ bhūmāvuttarāduttaratara niṣyandavāsanādhānayogena hetuparigraha iti //
T06abhsubhu:2994: tadetatpañcavidhāyā bhāvanāyāḥ phalaṃ pañcavidhaṃ nirvartata iti saṃdarśitam /
T06abhsubhu:2997: kena kāraṇena tulye dharmakāyaniṣyandatve vaipulyadharmo dhūpamālyādibhiḥ pūjyo na tathā śrāvakayānadharmaḥ
T06abhsubhu:3008: dharmamātrasaṃjñābhiḥ sarvaḥ saṃvyavahāro nirūḍhaḥ kiṃtarhi prāyeṇa sattvasaṃjñayā /
T06abhsubhu:3011: anutrāsārtham, pratītyasamutpādadharmatāyāma kovidāḥ sahasāditaḥ sarvathā sattvābhāvaṃ śrutvottrasyeyuriti /
T06abhsubhu:3012: ātmanaḥ pareṣāṃ ca doṣavattvaguṇavattvodbhāvanārthaṃ ca, itarathā hi sattvaprajñaptimantareṇa
T06abhsubhu:3013: saṃkleśavyavadānalakṣaṇamātradeśanāyāṃ satyāmamuṣmin saṃtāne 'mī doṣāḥ prahīṇā amī vā guṇā utpannā iti na śakyate vijñātumiti //
T06abhsubhu:3015: tatra rāgādicaritastīvrāyatarāgaḥ, hīne 'pi rañjanīye vastunyadhimātrarāgotpādādutpannasya ca ciramanubandhāt /
T06abhsubhu:3017: samabhāgacaritaḥprakṛti[stha]ḥ saṃkleśaḥ autkaṭayamāndyavivarjitasamāvasthe kleśa ityarthaḥ, yathāvastvanurūpaṃ kleśasamudācārāt /
T06abhsubhu:3023: prakṛtyā mṛdvindriyatvaṃ punarasya pratyekabuddhabodhisattvendriyā pekṣayā, itarathā hi dharmānusāryādayastīkṣṇendriyā ityetadvirudhyeta /
T06abhsubhu:3026: khaḍgaviṣāṇakalpo bhavatyeka vihārī, tadanyaḥ pratyekajino vargacārī
T06abhsubhu:3028: vyākaraṇaṃ ca pratyalabhata ityaṣṭābhyāṃ bhūmāvanutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiṃ pratilabhata ityarthaḥ //
T06abhsubhu:3029: asaṃbhṛtasaṃbhārādayo mokṣabhāgīyānāṃ ca mṛdumadhyādhi mātratayā nirvedhabhāgīyotpādanaṃ satyābhisamayaṃ ca pratiniyatāniyatatajjanmakālikatvādyathākramaṃ veditavyāḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3030: tatra satyādhipateye dharme 'dhimuktiprasādalakṣaṇāni mokṣabhāgīyāni, tatraiva dharmanidhyānakṣāntilakṣaṇāni
T06abhsubhu:3036: api jātisahasrāṇi nāsau gacchati durgatim // iti //
T06abhsubhu:3046: yadadhimātraṃ satyaprativedhāya tatraiva janmani saṃvartate tatprātivedhikam /
T06abhsubhu:3047: tatpunaryadaniyatagotrāṇāṃ bodhiviśeṣāya (Abhidh-s-bh 119) pariṇāmyate tacca pratyekabuddhānāmanācāryakābhisaṃbodhāya janmāntare pariṇamati tadanyapāriṇāmikam /
T06abhsubhu:3050: kāyasākṣī vimokṣalābhyanāgāmī, aṣṭau vimokṣān kāyena sākṣātkṛtvopasaṃpadya viharaṇāt /
T06abhsubhu:3051: aṣṭau vimokṣā rūpī rūpāṇi paśyatītyevamādayaḥ paścānnirdekṣyante /
T06abhsubhu:3054: srotāpattiphalapratipannaka ekāsanikaṃ nirvedhabhāgīyamārabhya yāvadādyaṃ phalaṃ na prāpnoti
T06abhsubhu:3057: yastu pūrvaṃ laukikena mārgeṇa kāmāvacarān bhāvanāprahātavyān ṣaṭprakārān prahāya yatra yo vītarāgo bhavan paścātsamyaktvaṃ niyāmamavakrāmati sa ṣoḍaśe cittakṣaṇe sakṛdāgāmyeva bhavati navāpi prakārān prahāya kāmavītarāgo bhavan yo niyāmamavakrāmati so 'nāgāmyeva bhavati //
T06abhsubhu:3062: vicikitsayā cāsanmārgābhiniveśātsanmārgasaṃśayanācca mithyā niryāti samyaktvamaniryāti // punaḥ satkāyadṛṣṭayā jñeye vipratipadyate,
T06abhsubhu:3067: sakṛdā[gā]miphalapratipannakaḥ darśanamārgādūrdhvaṃ kāmāvacarasya yāvanmadhyamadhyasya kleśaprakārasya prahāṇamārge yaḥ pudgalaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3068: sakṛdāgāmī madhyamṛdoḥ kleśaprakārasya prahāṇa mārga parisamāptau yaḥ pudgalaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3069: anāgāmiphalapratipannakaḥ sakṛdāgāmiphalādūrdhvaṃ kāmāvacarāṇāṃ mṛdvadhimātramṛdumadhyayoḥ (Abhidh-s-bh 120) kleśaprakārayoḥ prahāṇamārge yaḥ pudgalaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3070: anāgāmī navamasya mṛdumṛdoḥ kleśaprakārasya prahāṇāya mārgaparisamāptau yaḥ pudgalaḥ //
T06abhsubhu:3071: sarvakāmāvacarabhāvanāprahātavyaprahāṇe 'pi pañcānāmavarabhāgīyānāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇādanāgāmivacanaṃ sūtre eṣāṃ gatidhātvavarakāraṇatvena
T06abhsubhu:3082: kulaṃ kulaḥ kulaḥ srotāpanna eva sakṛdāgāmiphalapratipannako deveṣu vā manuṣyeṣu vā niyamena dvau bhavau saṃsṛtya parinirvāti /
T06abhsubhu:3083: ekavīcikaḥ sakṛdāgāmyevānāgāmiphalapratipannako deveṣvevaikaṃ bhavaṃ saṃsṛtyaṃ parinirvāti
T06abhsubhu:3085: antarāparinirvāyī yena kleśāvedhenopapattideśaṃ gatvā pratisandadhyāttatparikṣaye sati yenānuśayamātreṇa maraṇādūrdhva skandhānabhinirvartayan tadavaśeṣe satyantarābhavamabhinirvartya pūrvābhyastamārgasaṃmukhībhāvādeva sa viśiṣṭānuśayaprahāṇe parinirvāti /
T06abhsubhu:3091: tatra akaniṣṭhaga āsvādanābahulatayotpannotpannamṛdvādidhyānaprakārāsvādanāt brahmakāyikānārabhya nirantaraṃ (Abhidh-s-bh 121) sarveṣu sthānāntareṣu sakṛtsakṛdupapadyamāno yāvadakaniṣṭhānpraviśya parinirvāti /
T06abhsubhu:3092: bhavāgragaścaturthasya dhyānasyāvyavakīrṇabhāvitvāt kevalaṃ śuddhāvāsān parihṛtya tathaiva yāvadbhavāgraṃ gatvā parinirvāti /
T06abhsubhu:3093: vyavakīrṇabhāvitasya caturthasya dhyānasya mṛdvādipañcaprakārabhāvitatvādyathākramaṃ pañcasu śuddhāvāseṣūpapattirveditavyā /
T06abhsubhu:3097: ata evākopyadharmā bhavyaścendriyāṇyuttāpayitumiti noktam, prakṛtyā tīkṣṇendriyatvāt //
T06abhsubhu:3098: kāmāvacararūpāvacara eva bodhisattvo nārūpyāvacaraḥ, prabhāvaprāptasya sattvaparipācanānāyatanatāmupādāya tatrānupapattitaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3102: sattvaparipācanārthaṃ kāmadhātāvapi bodhisattva upapadyata iti veditavyam //
T06abhsubhu:3105: adhimukticārī bodhisattvagotre vyavasthita ādito mahābodhiprasthānamupādāya yāvatpramuditāṃ bhūmiṃ na praviśati, pratyātmaṃ lokottarābhigamābhāvāt /
T06abhsubhu:3110: animittacārī saptamyām, yatnaṃ kurvato yāvadicchaṃ nimittāsamudācārāt /
T06abhsubhu:3114: prakāraśa ityadhimātrādhimātrānkāmarūpārūpyāvacarānbhāvanāprahātavyānanuśayān prajahāti, evaṃ yāvan mṛdumṛdūn darśanaprahātavyān na tu
T06abhsubhu:3117: yāvadvijñānamatītānāgatapratyutpannamiti vistareṇa yāvaddūre yadvāntike tatsarvamekadhyamasaṃkṣipyaikaṃ (Abhidh-s-bh 122) bhāgaṃ karotyekaṃ piṇḍamekaṃ puñjamekaṃ rāśiṃ karotyekaṃ kṛtvātaḥ pratisaṃśikṣate
T06abhsubhu:3121: / madhyayostu na prajñāpyate, tayordṛṣṭasatyasya kāmavacarāṇāmeva bhāvanāprahātavyānāṃ sāvaśeṣaniravaśeṣaprahāṇaprabhāvitatvāt /
T06abhsubhu:3123: sa dṛṣṭe dharme yadyājñāṃ tārāgayati sarvato niḥśeṣamavītarāgatvātpraṇidhānavaśena kāmadhātāvupapadyate kṣipraparinirvāṇārtham //
T06abhsubhu:3125: tatra dharmābhisamayaḥ satyādhipateyeṣu sūtrādiṣu dharmeṣu paratoghoṣamadhipatiṃ kṛtvā dhimātrasyādhimuktiprasādasya paścimamokṣabhāgīyasaṃgṛhītasya pratilambhaḥ
T06abhsubhu:3130: sā punardharmanidhyānakṣāntistrividhena yoniśomanaskāreṇa prabhāvitā adhimātramṛdunā tajjanmakāleṣūṣmagateṣu, adhimātramadhyena mūrdhvasu kṣāntiṣu ca, adhimātrādhimātreṇa laukikeṣvagradharmeṣviti /
T06abhsubhu:3132: tatra punaḥ satyavyavasthāpanānyabhisamayāntikāni saṃvṛtijñānāni pratilambhato lokottarajñānādhipatyena tadabījapoṣaṇānna tu sammukhīkaroti ṣoḍaśānāṃ darśanamārgacittakṣaṇānāṃ nirantaratvena laukikacittānavakāśāt pṛṣṭhābhisamayo darśanamārgādūrdhvasarvabhāvanāmārgo laukiko lokottaro vā /
T06abhsubhu:3136: asamudācārābhisamayo yasyākaraṇasaṃvarasyāyaṃkāntaśīla saṃgṛhītasya lābhāttadvipakṣanarakādyasamudācāraṃ pratyevaṃ niścayaḥ pravarttate kṣoṇā me narakāḥ ityevamādiḥ so 'samudācārābhisamayaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3137: niṣṭhābhisamayaḥ sarvadauṣṭhulyānāṃ pratiprasrabdhirityevamādiryathā mārgasatye niṣṭhāmārgo nirdiṣṭaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3138: eta eva saptābhisamayāḥ śrāvakāṇāṃ paratoghoṣamāgamya pratilambhataḥ śrāvakābhisamaya ityucyate
T06abhsubhu:3140: bodhisattvābhisamaya eṣu saptasvabhisamayeṣu bodhisattvasya yā samudāgamakṣāntiḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhavinayopāyakauśalyārthaṃ (Abhidh-s-bh 123) no tu sākṣātkriyā sattvāpekṣayā hīnayānāniryāṇāt /
T06abhsubhu:3141: api khalu tatprathamato bodhisattvasya bhūmipraveśābhisamaya ityucyate //
T06abhsubhu:3142: etaṃ cābhisamaya niśrityocyate - śrāvakābhisamayādbodhisattvābhisamasya kaḥ prativiśeṣaḥ ālaṃbanaviśeṣato vaipulyālaṃbanatvāt /
T06abhsubhu:3144: prativedhaviśeṣataḥ pudgaladharmanairātmyādhipateyadharmaprayogavedhato lokottareṇa jñānena tadubhayaprativedhāt abhyupagamaviśeṣataḥ svātmasamatayā sarvasattvābhyupagamāt /
T06abhsubhu:3158: bhogaviśeṣaḥ sadā bodhisattveḥ saha parṣanmaṇḍaleṣu vicitradharmasaṃbhogāt /
T06abhsubhu:3159: kamaviśeṣo yathārhaṃ nirmāṇeḥ samantādanantāparyanteṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhakṛtyānuṣṭhānāditi
T06abhsubhu:3162: miśropamiśrajñānaśaktilābhaviśeṣataḥ suviśuddhadharmadhātvekarasatayā tadāśritāsu sarvākāravarajñatāsu pratyekaṃ sarvabuddhānāṃ sāmarthyāt /
T06abhsubhu:3165: abhisaṃbodhinirvāṇasaṃdarśanopāyaviśeṣato daśasu dikṣu yathāyogaṃ sarvalokadhātuṣu yāvadaparāntaṃ punaḥpunarbuddhotpādādi saṃdarśanena sarvavineyajanaparipācanavimocanāt /
T06abhsubhu:3170: apāyaparitrāṇaṃ darśanamārgotpādanena durgatisamatikramaṇāt satkāyaparitrāṇamarhattvasākṣātkaraṇena traidhātukavi mokṣāṇāt /
T06abhsubhu:3174: te punarmaitryādayo yathāsūtrāntareṣu nirdiṣṭāḥ śrāvakayāne mahāyāne ca tathaiva veditavyāḥ
T06abhsubhu:3175: teṣāṃ cāya samāsena pañcabhirākārairyathāyogaṃ lakṣaṇanirdeśo veditavyaḥ - niśrayata ālaṃbanata ākārataḥ svabhāvataḥ sahāyataśca //
T06abhsubhu:3176: tatra tāvat maitryā dhyānaṃ niśrayaḥ, sattvā ālaṃbanam, sukhena
T06abhsubhu:3180: upekṣayā sukhādiṣu sattveṣvanunayādyabhyupekṣaṇamaho vata saṃkleśādvimucyerannityayamākāro veditavyaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3183: rūpī rūpāṇi paśyatyayaṃ prathamo vimokṣa iti vistaraḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3185: svātmanyā rūpyasamāpattisaṃniśrayeṇa rūpasaṃjñāyā abhibhāvanādrūpasaṃjñāsaṃniveśanādvā draṣṭavyāni rūpasaṃjñāsaṃmukhī karaṇādityarthaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3192: śubhaṃ vimokṣaṃ kāyena sākṣātkṛtvopasaṃpadya viharata, śubhāśubheṣu rūpeṣvanyonyāpekṣāsaṃjñāmanyonyānugamasaṃjñāṃ
T06abhsubhu:3194: (Abhidh-s-bh 125) tathāhi śubhāni rūpāṇyapekṣya tadanyeṣvaśubhānīti bhavatyaśubhāni vāpekṣya śubhānīti nānapekṣyaikajātīyānāmeva darśane śubhāśubhatābuddhyabhāvāt /
T06abhsubhu:3195: tathāhi śubheṣvapyaśūbhatānugatāśubheṣvapi śubhatā, śubhasaṃmatasyāpi tvaṅmātrasya keśādiṣaṭtriśadaśucidravyāntarabhāvādityevamanyonyaṃ sarvarūpāṇi miśrayitvā śubhataikarasākārayā saṃjñayā vimucyate /
T06abhsubhu:3196: tasyaivaṃ rūpādivimokṣavibhutvalābhinaḥ śubhāśubhanirmāṇāvaraṇaṃ ca prahīyate tatra ca saṃkleśotpattyāvaraṇam
T06abhsubhu:3200: ākāśānantyāyatanādīni catvāryāryaśrāvakasya yānyanāśravānukūlāni śuddhāni tāni vimokṣakākhyāṃ
T06abhsubhu:3202: ye te śāntā vimokṣā atikramya rūpāṇyārūpyāsteṣvasaktiḥ pariśuddhiḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3207: sa ca mokṣānusadṛśo vihāraḥ, lokottareṇa mārgeṇa parivṛtyāśrayasyāryaśrāvakasya
T06abhsubhu:3210: ete cāṣṭau vimokṣā vihārā ityucyante, ebhirāryāṇāṃ viharaṇāt /
T06abhsubhu:3211: tatrāpi bahulamābhyāṃ vimokṣābhyāṃ viharanti, tṛtīyenāṣṭamena ca pradhānatvāt /
T06abhsubhu:3212: ata eva cānayoḥ kāyena sākṣātkṛtyopasaṃpadya viharatīti vacanaṃ nānyeṣu rūpyarūpivimokṣāvaraṇāśeṣaprahāṇādyathākramam
T06abhsubhu:3214: aṣṭāvabhibhvāyatanāni tatra adhyātmaṃ rūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati parīttāni suvarṇadurvarṇāni hīnapraṇī tāni, tāni khalu (Abhidh-s-bh 126)
T06abhsubhu:3215: rūpāṇyabhibhūya jānātyabhibhūya paśyati tathā ca saṃjñī bhavati /
T06abhsubhu:3217: adhyātmaṃ rūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyatyadhimātrāṇi suvarṇadurvarṇāni vistareṇa yāvattayā ca saṃjñī bhavati /
T06abhsubhu:3219: ityete dve abhibhvāyatane rūpī rūpāṇi paśyatītyetasmādvimokṣādabhinirhriyete /
T06abhsubhu:3220: adhyātmamarūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati parīttāni vistareṇa yāvattathāsaṃjñī ca bhavati
T06abhsubhu:3222: adhyātmamarūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyatyadhimātrāṇi yathā tathāsaṃjñī ca bhavati /
T06abhsubhu:3224: ityete dve abhibhvāyatane adhyātmamarūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyatītyeta smādvimokṣādabhinirhriyete
T06abhsubhu:3225: evaṃ kṛtvā dvābhyāṃ vimokṣābhyāṃ catvāryabhibhvāyatanāni veditavyāni /
T06abhsubhu:3226: adhyātma[ma]rūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati nīlāni nīlavarṇāni nīlanidarśanāni nīlanirbhāsāni
T06abhsubhu:3227: tadyathā umakāpuṣpaṃ saṃpannaṃ vā vārāṇasīyakaṃ vastraṃ nīlaṃ nīlavarṇa nīlanidarśanaṃ nīlanirbhāsamevamevādhyātmamarūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati nīlāni yāvannīlanirbhāsāni tāni khalu rūpāṇyabhibhūya jānātyābhibhūya paśyati tathāsaṃjñī ca bhavati /
T06abhsubhu:3229: adhyātmamarūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati pītāni yāvatpītanirbhāsāni /
T06abhsubhu:3230: tadyathā karṇikārapuṣpaṃ saṃpannaṃ vā vārāṇasīyakaṃ vastraṃ pītaṃ pītavarṇamiti vistaraḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3232: adhyātmamarūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati lohitāni yāvallohitanirbhāsāni /
T06abhsubhu:3233: tadyathā bandhujīvakapuṣpaṃ saṃpannaṃ vā vārāṇasīyaṃ vastraṃ lohitaṃ lohita[varṇa]miti vistaraḥ
T06abhsubhu:3236: tadyathā uṣasi tārakāyā varṇaṃ saṃpannaṃ vā vārāṇasīyakaṃ vastramavadātamavadātavarṇamavadātanidarśanamavadātanirbhāsamevamevādhyātmamarūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyatya vadātānyavadātavarṇānyavadātanidarśanānyavadātanirbhāsāni tāni khalu rūpāṇyabhibhūya jānātyabhibhūya paśyati tathāsaṃjñī ca bhavati /
T06abhsubhu:3238: etāni catvāri śubhaṃ vimokṣaṃ kāyena sākṣātkṛtvopasaṃpadya viharatītyetasmādvimokṣādabhinirhriyate
T06abhsubhu:3248: tathāsaṃjñī ca bhavatītyabhibhūte nābhibhūte vā tannirabhimānasaṃjñitāmupādāya /
T06abhsubhu:3260: tadyathomakāpuṣpaṃ saṃpannaṃ vā vārāṇasīyakaṃ vastraṃ nīlaṃ nīlavarṇamityevamādinirdeśa upapanno bhavati /
T06abhsubhu:3265: tatpunaryathā rūpī rūpāṇi paśyatītyevamādi nirdeśānusāreṇa draṣṭavyam //
T06abhsubhu:3266: evamabhibhvāyatanairālaṃbanaṃ vaśe vartayitvā kṛtsnāyatanaiḥ kṛtsnaṃ spharati samantānantā paryantaṃ vistārayatītyarthaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3268: tadyathā pṛthivīkṛtsnamapkṛtsnaṃ tejaḥkṛtsnaṃ vāyukṛtsnaṃ pītakṛtsnaṃ lohitakṛtsnamavadātakṛtsnamākāśānantyāyatanakṛtsnaṃ vijñānānantyāyatanakṛtsnaṃ ca /
T06abhsubhu:3269: kṛtsnāyataneṣu pṛthivyādīni yadi na vyavasthāpyeran tenāśrayamahābhūtairvinā tadupādāyarūpaṃ nīlādiakaṃ spharituṃ na śakyeta /
T06abhsubhu:3270: tasyāśrayasya rūpasya spharaṇasamṛddhimupādāyaiṣāṃ kṛtsneṣu vyavasthānaṃ veditavyam /
T06abhsubhu:3272: tatra vimokṣairārambhaḥ, abhibhvāyataneḥ prayogaḥ, kṛtsnāyatanaiḥ pariniṣpattirvimokṣāṇāṃ veditavyāḥ //
T06abhsubhu:3273: araṇā vihārī yeṣāṃ sattvānāmābhāsaṃ gantukāmo bhavati teṣāmātmani
T06abhsubhu:3275: praṇidhijñāna balenāvalokya tathā tatsamīpamupasaṃkrāmati na vā yathā te tatrānunayapratidherṣyāmātsaryādikaṃ kleśopakleśasaraṇaṃ notpādayanti /
T06abhsubhu:3276: ata idamucyate 'raṇā dhyānaṃ niśritya kleśotpattyanurakṣāvihārasamṛddhāviti vistaraḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3278: jñātukāmobhavati, tatra tatra mānasaṃ praṇidhāyedaṃ jānīyāmiti dhyānaṃ
T06abhsubhu:3279: samāpadyate, tato vyutthitasya tatpraṇidhānaṃ samṛdhyati, tajjñeyaṃ jānātītyarthaḥ //
T06abhsubhu:3283: niruktipratisaṃvijjanapadabhāṣāyāmiti prativiṣayaṃ yathāsvamanyonyasaṃjñāntarānuvyavahāre, dharmanirvacane ceti tadyathā lujyate pralujyate tasmāllokaḥ, rūpyate tasmādrūpa ityevamādike pratibhānapratisaṃviddharmaprabhedeṣviti dravyasantaḥ prajñaptisantaḥ saṃvṛtisantaḥ paramārthasanta ityevamādiṣu //
T06abhsubhu:3284: ṛddhayabhijñā vicitraddhivikuvitasamṛddhāviti tadyathā eko bhūtvā bahudhā bhavatītyevamādau
T06abhsubhu:3288: cyutyutpādābhijñā divyena cakṣuṣā sattvānāṃ cyavamānānāmupapadyamānānāṃ suvarṇānāṃ durvarṇānāṃ sugatimapi gacchatāṃ durgatimapyaparāntamārabhya
T06abhsubhu:3291: lakṣaṇānuvyañjanāni yatsamādhiprajñādhipatyena buddhā bhagavanto dvātriṃśatā lakṣaṇairaśītyānuvyañjanaiḥ vibhrājamānaṃ rūpakāyaṃ saṃdarśayanti vineyānām /
T06abhsubhu:3296: catasraḥ sarvakārāḥ pariśuddhayo buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ mahābhijñāprāptānāṃ ca bodhisattvānām
T06abhsubhu:3297: tatra yathākāmamāśrayasyopādānasthānaparityāgānāṃ samṛddhāviti yatrecchati tatropapattigrahaṇataḥ, tasyāṃ copapattāvāyuḥsaṃskārānadhiṣṭhāya yāvadicchamavasthānataḥ, yadecchati tadāyuḥsaṃskārotsarjanataśca yathākramam /
T06abhsubhu:3305: daśa balāni - sthānāsthānajñānabalaṃ karmasvakajñānabalaṃ dhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattijñānabalamindriyaparāparajñānabalaṃ nānādhimuktijñānabalaṃ nānādhātujñānabalaṃ
T06abhsubhu:3309: catvāri vaiśāradyāni - samyaksaṃbuddhasya vata me sata ime te dharmā anabhisaṃbuddhā ityatra māṃ kaścicchramaṇo vā devo vā māro vā brahmā vā
T06abhsubhu:3310: sahadharmeṇa codayedvā smārayedvā nimittamapi na samanupaśyāmyetacca
T06abhsubhu:3311: nimitta[ma]samanupaśyan kṣemaprāptaśca vaiśāradyaprāptaścodāramārṣabhaṃ sthānaṃ prajānāmi, brahmacaryaṃ pravartayāmi, pariṣadi samyak siṃhanādaṃ
T06abhsubhu:3313: kṣīṇāsravasya vata me sata ime āsravā aparikṣīṇā iti /
T06abhsubhu:3314: ye vā punarme śrāvakā[ṇā]mantarāyikā dharmā ākhyātāḥ tān pratiṣevamānasya nālamantarāyāteti (Abhidh-s-bh 130) yo vā punarme śrāvakāṇāṃ niryāṇāya mārga ākhyāta āryonairyāṇiko nairvedhikaḥ sa vata na samyaṅniryāti tatkarasya samyagduḥ[kha]kṣayāya duḥkhasyāntakriyāyai ityatra māṃ kaścit śramaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā yāvatsiṃhanādaṃ nadāmīti vistareṇaikaikasmin vaktavyam tānyetāni vaiśāradyāni svārthaṃ parārthaṃ cārabhya veditavyāni
T06abhsubhu:3317: tatrābhisaṃbodhivaiśāradyaṃ jñānātmakaṃ svārthamevārabhya sarvākāraṃ mayā saprabhedaparyantaṃ jñeyamabhisaṃbuddhamityetasyāḥ pratijñāyāḥ samyaṅniranuyojyatvena sarvasmin loke pratiṣṭhāpanasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiriti pūrvavat /
T06abhsubhu:3320: sarvākārā antarāyikā dharmāḥ sarve sāṃkleśikāḥ vipakṣadharmā draṣṭavyāḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3321: sarvākāro nairyāṇiko mārgaḥ prayogamārgamārabhya yāvanniṣṭhāmārgo draṣṭavyaḥ //
T06abhsubhu:3323: iha śāstā śrāvakāṇāṃ dharmaṃ deśayatyanukampakaḥ kāruṇiko 'rthakāmo hitaiṣī karuṇāyamānaḥ - idaṃ vo bhikṣavo hitāya idaṃ sukhāya idaṃ hitasukhāyeti /
T06abhsubhu:3324: tasya te śrāvakāḥ śuśrūṣante śrotramavadadhatyājñācittamupasthāpayanti pratipadyante dharmasyānudharmam
T06abhsubhu:3325: tatra tathāgatasya na nāndī bhavati na saumanasyaṃ na cetasa utplāvitatvamupekṣakastatra tathāgato viharati smṛtaḥ saṃprajānan /
T06abhsubhu:3329: punaraparaṃ śāstā śrāvakāṇāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati yāvadidaṃ hitasukhāya /
T06abhsubhu:3330: tasya te śrāvakā na śuśrūṣante yāvanna pratipadyante dharmasyānudharmam /
T06abhsubhu:3331: tatra tathāgatasya nāghāto bhavati nākṣāntirnāpratyayo na cetaso 'nabhirāddhirupekṣakastatreti vistaraḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3334: yāvatpratipadyante dharmasyānudharmameke na śuśrūṣante yāvanna pratipadyante dharmasyānudharmam
T06abhsubhu:3335: tatra tathāgatasya na nāndo bhavati yāvaccetaso nābhirāddhiriti /
T06abhsubhu:3340: nāsti tathāgatasyāpariśuddhakāyasamudācāratā yāṃ tathāgataḥ praticchādayitavyāṃ manyeta kaccinme pare vi[jā]nīyuriti /
T06abhsubhu:3344: asaṃmoṣadharmatā sarvavineyakāryamārabhya yathāvatkṛtasya bhāṣitasya cābhilapanasamṛddhau samādhyādayaḥ //
T06abhsubhu:3345: vāsanāsamudghātaḥ sarvajñasya sataḥ kleśajñeyāvaraṇaśeṣasūcakānāṃ kāyavākceṣṭitānāmasamudācārasamṛddhau samādhyādayaḥ //
T06abhsubhu:3346: mahākaruṇā traidhātukāvacareṣu sarvasattveṣu nirantarasarvaprakāraduḥkhālaṃbana karuṇāvihārasamṛddhau samādhyādayaḥ //
T06abhsubhu:3347: aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāstadyathā nāsti tathāgatasya skhalitam, nāsti
T06abhsubhu:3348: ravitam, nāsti muṣitā smṛtiḥ, nāstyasamāhitaṃ cittam, nāsti nānātvasaṃjñā,
T06abhsubhu:3349: nāstya pratisaṃkhyāyopekṣā, nāsti chandaparihāṇiḥ, nāsti vīryaparihāṇiḥ,
T06abhsubhu:3350: nāsti smṛtiparihāṇiḥ, nāsti samādhiparihāṇiḥ, nāsti prajñārihāṇiḥ, nāsti
T06abhsubhu:3352: jñānānuparivarti, sarvaṃ vākkarma jñānapūrvagamaṃ jñānānuparivarti, sarvaṃ manaskarma jñānapūrvagamaṃ jñānānuparivarti, atīte
T06abhsubhu:3355: eṣāṃ punarvyavasthānam, tadyathā arhan bhikṣuḥ kṣīṇāsravaḥ grāmaṃ piṇḍāya
T06abhsubhu:3362: araṇye vā punamārgaṃ hitvā kumārgeṇa gacchati /
T06abhsubhu:3363: corairvā taskarairvā sārdhaṃ samāgacchati siṃhairvyāghrairvāparavṛkairvā ityevaṃbhāgīyaṃ skhalitamarhatastathāgatasya sarveṇa sarva nāsti /
T06abhsubhu:3364: punarayamarhannekadāraṇye pravaṇe 'nvāhiṇḍanmārgādapanaśya śūnyāgāraṃ praviśya śabdamudīrayati, ghoṣamanuśrāvayati, mahārutaṃ ravati /
T06abhsubhu:3365: vāsanādoṣaṃ vāgamya kliṣṭaṃ mahāhāsaṃ hasati, dantavidarśakaṃ saṃcagdhitamupadarśayati /
T06abhsubhu:3366: ityevaṃbhāgīyamarhato ravitaṃ tathāgatasya sarveṇa sarvaṃ nāsti /
T06abhsubhu:3370: punaraparamarhannekāntenopadhā ca pratikramaṇasaṃjñī bhavati nirupadhike ca nirvāṇe śāntasaṃjñī
T06abhsubhu:3371: tathāgatasya upadhau nirvāṇe ca nānātvasaṃjñā nāsti,
T06abhsubhu:3375: punaraparamarhan jñeyāvaraṇaviśuddhimārabhyāprāptaparihāṇyā chandenāpi parihīyate vīrye ṇāpismṛtyā samādhinā prajñayā vimuktyā vimuktijñānadarśanenāpi parihīyate
T06abhsubhu:3379: tathāgatasya trayāṇāmapi karmaṇāṃ jñānapūrvagamatvājjñānānuparivartitvācca nāstyavyākṛtaṃ karma tatra jñānasamutthāpanatāmupādāya jñānapūrvagamam /
T06abhsubhu:3381: punaraparamarhan traiyadhvikaṃ jñeyavastu na cābhogamātrātpratipadyate yenāsya saktaṃ jñānadarśanaṃ bhavati /
T06abhsubhu:3382: na ca sarvaṃ pratipadyate yenāsya pratihataṃ jñānadarśanaṃ bhavati /
T06abhsubhu:3388: tatra nāsti muṣitasmṛtiḥ nāstyasamānitaṃ cittaṃ nāsti nānātvasaṃjñā nāstyapratisaṃkhyāyopekṣetyetaccatuṣṭayaṃ manaskarmapariśuddhimadhikṛtya veditavyam /
T06abhsubhu:3389: nāsti chandaparihāṇiryāvannāsti vimuktijñānadarśanaparihāṇiriti sāśrayāṇāṃ saphalānāṃ tathāgatendriyāṇāmaprāptyaparihāṇisamṛddhau samādhyādayaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3393: sarvaṃ kāyakarma vākkarma manaskarma jñānapūrvagamaṃ jñānānuvartītyete trayo 'sādhāraṇakarmacārasamṛddhau
T06abhsubhu:3399: abhinirhāropāyaḥ punaryathāvyavasthānaṃ manaskārabahulīkāratā yathādeśanaṃ samāhitasya cittasya punaḥpunastatra dhāraṇamityarthaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3400: tadyathāpramāṇānyabhinirhartukāmo maṃtrīsahagatena cittenāvaireṇāsapatnenetyevamādikāṃ deśanāṃ dhyānasaṃniśrayeṇa bhāvayan manasikurvan bahulīkaroti, evamabhijñādīnabhi nirhartukāma eko bhūtvā bahudhā bhavatītyevamādikaṃ vyavasthānaṃ manasikurvan bahulīkarotīti
T06abhsubhu:3403: svakāritrapratyupasthānāśca yairāryo yathāyogaṃ vipakṣaprahāṇādikaṃ karma karoti, vaihārikāśca yaiḥ paramapraśāntanirvikalpajñānasaṃgṛhītairanālaṃbanāpramāṇādibhirdṛṣṭe dharme sukhaṃ viharati //
T06abhsubhu:3404: tatrāpramāṇaivipakṣaṃ prajahātīti yathākramaṃ vyāpādaṃ vihiṃsāmaratimanunayapratighau ca /
T06abhsubhu:3405: etāni ca catvāryapramāṇānyanukampetyucyate, ebhiḥ sattvārthaṃ pratyanuguṇaṃ
T06abhsubhu:3408: ata eva sattvaparipāke ca na parikhidyate,
T06abhsubhu:3417: araṇāyā ādeyavacano bhavati, paracittānurakṣaṇapradhānatayā yathānurūpaṃ vacanāt //
T06abhsubhu:3418: praṇidhijñānena bahumataśca bhavati lokasya, sarvaṃ jānātīti gauravitatvāt
T06abhsubhu:3419: pratisaṃvidbhirdeśanayā sattvacittāni saṃtoṣayati, bahuvicitraiḥ prakāraiḥ saṃśayacchedanāt
T06abhsubhu:3425: baleṣu dvābhyāṃ balābhyāmabhyudayamārga deśayati śeṣairniḥśreyasamārgame tāvacca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ karaṇīyam /
T06abhsubhu:3426: tatra sthānāsthānajñānabalena bhagavannirhetuko 'bhyudayaḥ prakṛtīśvarādihetuko vetyevamahetuviṣamahetuvādaṃ pratikṣipati /
T06abhsubhu:3427: karmasvakatājñānabalena svayamakṛtamapi karmāgacchatītyevamakṛtābhyāgamavādaṃ pratikṣipati, yataḥ samyagaviparītaṃ sugatimārga deśayati /
T06abhsubhu:3436: āsravakṣayajñānabalena niḥsaraṇaṃ ca sarvasmāttraidhātukādanupraviśati yato yathāvanmokṣamārga deśayati //
T06abhsubhu:3438: viśeṣaḥ punarjñeyāvaraṇaprahāṇe 'pyanantarāyakṛtatvāt, sthānāsthāne yāvadāsravakṣaya iti sarvatra praśnaṃ pṛṣṭasya praśnavyākaraṇavyāghātācca
T06abhsubhu:3444: asaṃmoṣadharmatayā buddhakṛtyaṃ na hāpayati, upasthite sattvārthakṛtye pramādena kṣaṇamapyalaṃghanāt
T06abhsubhu:3445: vāsanāsamudghātena niḥkleśaḥ kleśapratirūpāṃ ceṣṭāṃ na darśayati yathārhan bhikṣuḥ skhalitādikaṃ darśayati //
T06abhsubhu:3446: mahākaruṇayā ṣaṭkṛtvā rātriṃdivasena lokaṃ vyavalokayati, ko hīyate kaḥ
T06abhsubhu:3451: dharmanetrīṃ ca dīrghakālamavasthāpayati, tatra tatra vineyasaṃśayacchedanārtha deśitānāṃ dharmaparyāyāṇāṃ saṃgītikārairanukrameṇa saṃjñāpanāt /
T06abhsubhu:3452: (Abhidh-s-bh 136) dharmanetrīṃ nisrityāparipakvāḥ sattvāḥ paripacyante paripakvāśca vimucyante
T06abhsubhu:3453: viśiṣṭamārgalābhe hīnamārgavihānistadyathā phalasaṃgṛhītamārgalābhe pratipannakamārgo vihīna ityucyate, punarasaṃmukhīkaraṇāt /
T06abhsubhu:3454: sakalaprahāṇaṃ ca sākṣātkaroti phalaprāptikāle tu tadvipakṣajātīyakleśapratipakṣadauṣṭhulyāśeṣaprahāṇādāśrayaparivṛttiviśeṣalābhataḥ samavasargavihānyā vijahātī[tya]tyantāsamudācāraṃ vijahā[tī]tyarthaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3457: ata eva bodhisattvā akṣayakuśalamūlā akṣayaguṇā ityucyante tadyathākṣamiti [sūtre]
T06abhsubhu:3460: teṣāṃ teṣāṃ praśnānāṃ kīdṛśaḥ punaḥ praśno 'rthopasaṃhitaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3467: bhrāntyāśrayo yasminnāryajñā nagocare saṃskāranimittamātre 'bhūtaparikalpātmake sati bālānāṃ so 'bhiniveśaḥ
T06abhsubhu:3474: sattvaparipākakauśalyaṃ catvāri saṃgrahavastūni, taiḥ saṃgṛhya kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu niyojanāt
T06abhsubhu:3476: 137) buddhadharmaparipūraṇakauśalyaṃ prajñāpāramitā, dānapāramitāṃ yāvat sarvākāravarajñatāṃ paripūrayitukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvenāsyāmeva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyamiti vacanāt kṣiprābhijñatākauśalyaṃ ṣaṭkṛtvā rātridivasaṃ pāpapratideśanā puṇyānumodanā buddhādhyeṣaṇā kuśalamūlapariṇāmanā ca yathākra[ma]māryamaitreyaparipṛcchāyām /
T06abhsubhu:3477: dharmānupacchedakauśalyaṃ cāpratiṣṭhitanirvāṇatayā punaḥpanaranuparatamatyantaṃ ca samantāllokadhātuṣu yathāvineyaṃ buddhabodhisattvacaryāsaṃdarśanāditi //
T06abhsubhu:3496: sa eṣa daśavidho vikalpaḥ prajñāpāramitādinirdeśamadhikṛtya veditavyaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3497: yathoktam iha śāriputra bodhisattvo bodhisattva eva san bodhisattvaṃ na samanupaśyati /
T06abhsubhu:3503: tathāhi nāma svabhāvena śūnyaṃ na śūnyatayā, rūpaṃ svabhāvena śūnyaṃ na śūnyatayā yāvadvijñānaṃ
T06abhsubhu:3507: tadrūpam, nāpyanyatra, rūpācchanyatā, rūpameva śūnyatāḥ, śūnyataiva rūpam,
T06abhsubhu:3510: nāmamātramidaṃ yaduta bodhisattvanāmeti bodhisattva iti prajñāpāramiteti bodhiriti rūpamiti yāvadvijñānamiti /
T06abhsubhu:3511: svabhāvasya hi notpādo na nirodho na saṃkleśo na vyavadānam /
T06abhsubhu:3512: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran bodhisattva utpādamapi na samanupaśyati yāvadvayavadānamapi na samanupaśyati
T06abhsubhu:3514: kṛtrimaṃ nāma prati prati te dharmāḥ kalpitā āgantukena nāmnānuvyavahriyante /
T06abhsubhu:3519: bodhisattvo bodhisattva eva sannityevamādi, sacchabdasya bhāvārthatvāt /
T06abhsubhu:3521: yāvadvayavadānamapi na samanupaśyati yāvanna caratīti na samanupaśyati pudgaladharmabhāvapratiṣedhāt
T06abhsubhu:3522: samāropavikalpapratipakṣeṇāha - tathāhi nāma svabhāvena śūnyamiti, abhūtaparikalpasya svabhāvapratiṣedhāt
T06abhsubhu:3523: apavādavikalpapratipakṣeṇāha - na śūnyatayeti, tasminnāmni tena parikalpitena parikalpita svabhāvena virahitatāyāḥ sarvadāstitvāt /
T06abhsubhu:3524: ekatvavikalpaprati pakṣaiṇāha - yā rūpasya śūnyatā na tadrūpaṃ yāvadvijñānamiti, bhāvāntaratvāt
T06abhsubhu:3525: rūpādayo hi parikalpitaḥ svabhāvaḥ śūnyatā pariniṣpanna iti /
T06abhsubhu:3526: pṛthakatvavikalpapratipakṣeṇāha - nāpyanyatra rūpācchūnyatāyā rūpam, yāvacchanyataiva vijñānamiti,
T06abhsubhu:3532: yathānāmārthavikalpapratipakṣeṇāha - kṛtrimaṃ (Abhidh-s-bh 139) nāma prati prati te dharmāḥ kalpitā āgantukena nāmnā vyavahriyante ityevamādi /
T06abhsubhu:3533: yathārthanāmavikalpapratipakṣeṇāha - tāni bodhisattvaḥ sarvanāmāni na samanu paśyannābhiniviśata iti, yathārthaṃ nāmnāmadarśanā[na]bhiniveśāt //
T06abhsubhu:3537: labdhaparitoṣā bhavantyevametaditi niścinvantaḥ sā teṣāṃ saṃtuṣṭinirvikalpatetyucyate, tatra sarvatarkākhyavikalpoparateḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3538: śrāvakāḥ skandheṣu nityādiviparyāsapratipakṣeṇa yathāvadrūpādikaṃ dharmadhātuṃ parīkṣamāṇā lokottareṇa jñānena nairātmyaṃ pratividhyantyataḥ sā teṣāmaviparyāsanirvikalpatetyucyate /
T06abhsubhu:3539: bodhisattvāstadapi rūpādidharmamātraṃ prapañca iti viditvā sarvadharmanimittāni vibhāvayantaḥ paramaśāntena lokottareṇa jñānena sarvatragāṃ tathatāṃ pratividhyantyataḥ sā teṣāṃ niṣprapañcanirvikalpatetyucyate kathaṃ punarasau niṣprapañcanirvikalpatetyucyate /
T06abhsubhu:3541: atha samatikramatastena dvitīyadhyānāt prabhṛti sarvatra nirvikalpatā prāpnoti,
T06abhsubhu:3542: [vi]tarkavicāravikalpānāṃ samatikramāt, tataśca vikalpasya śarīraṃ hi cittacaittāḥ traidhātukā ityasya virodhaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3545: atha svabhāvatastena rūpaṃ nirvikalpatā prāpnoti, tasyāvikalpasvabhāvatvāt /
T06abhsubhu:3551: yadā hyasya bodhisattvasyānulomikamavavādamāgamya prakṛtyā sarvadharmanimittānyapariniṣpannānīti vicārayatastadvicāraṇābhyāsabalādhānāt pratyātmamanabhisaṃskāreṇaiva
T06abhsubhu:3552: yathāvanniṣprapañcadhātau sarvadharmatathatāyāṃ cittaṃ samādhīyate sāsāvucyate niṣprapañcanirvikalpateti
T06abhsubhu:3554: prakṛtyā tīkṣṇendriyo bodhisattva ityuktaṃ prākkathaṃ tena kālena kālamindriyāṇyutāpayitavyānītyucyate
T06abhsubhu:3556: anyathā tīkṣṇendriyagotrāṇāmindriyāṇāmaikavidhye sati bodhisattvānāmindriyakṛto viśeṣo naivopalabhyate
T06abhsubhu:3559: sāṃkathyaviniścayo nāma pañcamaḥ samuccayaḥ saptavidhasāṃkathyaviniścaye 'rthaviniścayaḥ svabhāvārthādīn ṣaḍarthānārabhya veditavyaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3565: pravṛttihetustadyathāvidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā yāvatsamudayo nirodhaśca bhavatītyetayānupūrvyā saṃkleśavyavadānapravṛtteḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3570: niṣpandaphalaṃ tadyathā pūrvotpannānāṃ kuśalādīnāṃ dharmāṇāṃ tatsāntānikā uttara kuśalādayo dharmāḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3574: yogārthaḥ pañca yogāḥ sāmūhiko yogastadyathā gṛhakāṣṭheṣṭakādīnām /
T06abhsubhu:3575: ānubandhiko yogastadyathā[nu]śayādihetuḥ, tathāhi tasmin satyasamudācaradbhirapi kleśādibhiryukta ityucyate /
T06abhsubhu:3577: āvasthiko yogastadyathānugrahādyāḥ saṃtānavyavasthāḥ, tathāhi tāsu vartamānaḥ sukhena yukto yāvadduḥkhāsukhena yukta ityucyate /
T06abhsubhu:3579: saṃmukhībhāvaḥ, tathāhi tasmin sati rāgādibhiḥ śraddhādibhiśca yukta
T06abhsubhu:3588: sa punaḥ parijñeyavastvādīnāṃ ṣaṣṇāmarthānāṃ pratisūtraṃ yathāsaṃbhavaṃ pratipādanāt /
T06abhsubhu:3601: aṅgopāṅgamukhaṃ yatraikena padenoddeśaḥ śeṣairnirdeśa iti pradarśyate /
T06abhsubhu:3603: uttarottaranirhāramukhaṃ yatrottarasyottarasyābhinirharaṇāśrayatvādette dharmā evaṃ deśitā iti pradarśyate /
T06abhsubhu:3608: tadyathā vāsyaupamyasūtre āsravakṣayamārabhya catvāraḥ pudgalāḥ pratikṣipyante /
T06abhsubhu:3609: ito bāhyaka ihadhārmikaḥ śrutacintāmātrasaṃtuṣṭaḥ bhāvanāyāṃ paritasyamāno 'paripūrṇasaṃbhāraśca
T06abhsubhu:3610: jānataścāhaṃ bhikṣavaḥ paśyataścāsravāṇāṃ kṣayaṃ vadāmītyevamādinā sūtrakhaṇḍenādyaḥ pudgalaḥ pratikṣiptaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3624: tatrobhayato vatāyaṃ sujātaḥ kulaputraḥ śobhate yacca keśaśmaśrūṇyavahārya yāvat pravrajito yaccāsravāṇāṃ kṣayādyāvatprajānāmītyanenāpraṇāśatadupāyāpadeśena tadviparītalakṣaṇapraṇāśatadupāyau sūcitau bhavataḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3625: apraṇāśaprabhedo gāthānugītena darśitaḥ - "śobhate vata bhikṣurayamupaśānto nirāśrava" iti
T06abhsubhu:3629: dhārayatyanti maṃ dehaṃ jitvā mārasya vāhinīm //
T06abhsubhu:3636: tadyathā audakopame sūtre dvividhau pudgalau tricatuḥprabhedānadhikṛtya bhāṣitam - pṛthagjanaṃ dṛṣṭasatyaṃ ca /
T06abhsubhu:3642: tadyathānityasūtre - yaḥ sadidaṃ samanupaśyati sarvo 'sau rūpaṃ
T06abhsubhu:3643: samanupaśyati, yo vā rūpaṃ samanupaśyati sarvaḥ sa sadidaṃ samanupaśyatīti catuṣkoṭikaḥ
T06abhsubhu:3645: dvitīyā koṭī rūpaṃ nityaśucisukhātmaviparyāsaiḥ samāropyāparijñeyāprahātavyaṃ ca samanupaśyataḥ
T06abhsubhu:3646: tṛtīyā koṭī rūpaṃ nityaśucisukhātmaviparyāsairasamāropya parijñeyaprahātavyāṃśca samanupaśyataḥ caturthīkoṭirvedanādīṃścaturaḥ skandhānnityaśucisukhātmaviparyāsaiḥ samāropyāparijñeyāprahātavyaṃ ca
T06abhsubhu:3648: yathā rūpe catuṣkoṭika evaṃ vedanādau sarvatra vistareṇa draṣṭavyam /
T06abhsubhu:3649: yāvadyasya kṛtaṃ karaṇīyaṃ sarvaḥ sa nāparamasmādbhavaṃ
T06abhsubhu:3650: prajānāti, yāvannāparamasmādbhavaṃ prajānāti sarvasya tasya kṛtaṃ karaṇīyam /
T06abhsubhu:3656: nayamukhaṃ yatra ṣaḍbhirnayairartho varṇyate - tattvārthanayena prāptinayena deśanānayenāntadvayavivarjanānayenācintyanayenābhiprāyanayena
T06abhsubhu:3658: eṣāṃ ca ṣaṇṇāṃ nayānāṃ pūrvakāstrayo nayā uttaraistribhirnayairyathākramamanugantavyāḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3659: tadyathāsvādanasūtre - asti bhikṣavaḥ rūpe āsvāda ityevamādināpavādāntaṃ samāropāntaṃ ca varjayitvā tattvārthanayo 'bhidyotitaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3660: astyāsvāda ādīnavo niḥsaraṇamityanenāpavādānto varjitaḥ, rūpe yāvadvijñāna ityanena
T06abhsubhu:3661: samāropāntaḥ, skandhamātre saṃkleśo vyavadānaṃ cānātmanīti pradarśayatā yāvaccāhaṃ bhikṣavaḥ yāvadanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddho
T06abhsubhu:3669: parijñeyo 'rtha āsvādādikaḥ, tena prakāreṇa tasya rūpādikasya vastunaḥ parijñānāt /
T06abhsubhu:3681: prahāṇalakṣaṇaṃ sākṣātkriyālakṣaṇaṃ ca sarvasmāllokādvimuktiḥ, āvaraṇaprahāṇe nāśrayaparivṛttisākṣātkaraṇāt bhāvanālakṣaṇaṃ viparyāsāpagatena cetasā bahulavihāraḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3684: parijñālakṣaṇasya tridhā bheda āsvādaṃ cāsvādayato yāvanniḥsaraṇaṃ ca niḥsarato yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
T06abhsubhu:3686: tatra sadevakāllokādyāvatsadevamānuṣāyāḥ prajāyā vimuktiḥ kleśebhyo vimokṣādata eva tadviśeṣaṇārthamāha niḥsṛta iti /
T06abhsubhu:3689: evamanāgataduḥkhābhinirvartaka kleśavisaṃyoge sati duḥkhādapi vipramukto bhavatīti viśeṣaṇārthamāha - visaṃyukto vipramukta iti /
T06abhsubhu:3691: tatra viparyāsāpagatena cetaseti darśanamārgaṃ darśayati, bahulaṃ vyahārṣamityanena bhāvanāmārgam
T06abhsubhu:3697: balābalamukhaṃ yatraikena padenānucyamānenāyamartho na gamitaḥ syāditi pratyekaṃ sarveṣāṃ padānāṃ sāmarthya pradarśyate /
T06abhsubhu:3699: yadutāvidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā ityevamādi, eṣāṃ ca padānāṃ pratyekaṃ sāmarthya pūrvavadveditavya yathā pratītyasamutpādasya lakṣaṇanirdeśe //
T06abhsubhu:3701: pratyāhāramukhaṃ yatra sūtrasyaikaṃ padaṃ gṛhītvā vistareṇārthaḥ pratinirdiśyate /
T06abhsubhu:3702: tadyathā ṣaḍbhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgato bhikṣurhimavantamapi parvatarājaṃ mukhavāyunā cālayet, kaḥ punarvādaḥ savāsanāyā avidyā[yā]ḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3704: iha bhikṣavo bhikṣuścittasyotpādakuśalo bhavati iha bhikṣurviviktaṃ kāmairyāvaccaturthadhyānamupasaṃpadya viharati /
T06abhsubhu:3707: iha bhikṣurāsevanānvayādyaddhānabhāgīyaṃ dhyānaṃ tat sthitibhāgīyaṃ karoti /
T06abhsubhu:3713: iha bhikṣuranutpannānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāmiti vistareṇa dve samyakprahāṇe /
T06abhsubhu:3716: iha hi bhikṣurutpannānāṃ pāpakā nāmakuśalānāmiti vistareṇa dve samyakprahāṇe /
T06abhsubhu:3719: iha hi bhikṣuśchandasamādhipradhānasaṃskārasamanvāgatamṛddhipādaṃ bhāvayatīti vistareṇa catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3722: teṣvapi catuṣkādiṣvekaikaṃ padamaparaiścatuṣkādibhiraparyanto hi nirhāro veditavyaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3725: bodhisattvānāṃ nityaṃ hitopasaṃharaṇatā, nirāmiṣeṇa cittena dharmadānasaṃprakāśanatā ceti
T06abhsubhu:3726: catuṣkaḥ svārtha paramārtha cārabhya bodhipariśodhanāya caturvipakṣapratipakṣeṇa veditavyaḥ
T06abhsubhu:3727: catvāro vipakṣāḥ - samāpattyāsvādanā, vyāpādaḥ, mānaḥ, tṛṣṇā ca lābhasatkāre //
T06abhsubhu:3736: caturbhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgatā bodhisattvāḥ śūnyatāṃ bhāvayanti - adhyātmaṃ
T06abhsubhu:3739: yadāśritya yathā ca bhāvayanti tadetena paridīpitam /
T06abhsubhu:3744: caturbhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgatā bodhisattvāḥ sarvasattveṣvapratihatacittā bhavanti maitrībhāvanayā, pratipatyavikopanatayā, nimittāvikalpanatayā,
T06abhsubhu:3746: atrāpi yadāśritya yathā cāpratihatacittā bhavanti tatparidīpitaṃ bhavati /
T06abhsubhu:3752: caturbhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgatā bodhisattvā bodhisattvānāṃ nityaṃ hitamupasaṃharanti - ātmanaḥ paritulanatayā, samyagavavādapravartanatayā,
T06abhsubhu:3759: caturbhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgatā bodhisattvā nirāmiṣeṇa cittena dharmadānaṃ saṃprakāśayanti -
T06abhsubhu:3766: saṃdarśanato mūḍhānām, samādāpanataḥ samuttejanataśca pramādasaṅgānātmaparibhavena vā līnānām,
T06abhsubhu:3773: ekāvacārako nāma praśno yenaikaṃ dharmaṃ pariśiṣṭaiḥ saha pratyekaṃ praśnayitvā tamapahāya dvitīyaṃ tenānyaiśca saha praśnayatyevamekaikasyaiva sarvān praśnayati /
T06abhsubhu:3774: tadyathā yaścakṣurāyatanena samanvāgato rūpāyatanenāpi saḥ, yo vā rūpāyatanena cakṣurāyatanenāpi sa iti pūrvapādakaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3775: yaścakṣurāyatanena samanvāgataḥ śrotrāyatanenāpi sa ityatra catuṣkoṭikam /
T06abhsubhu:3776: evaṃ yāvanmanaāyatanenāpi sa ityatra yathāyogaṃ yojayitavyam /
T06abhsubhu:3778: yo rūpāyatanena samanvāgataścakṣurāyatanenāpi saḥ, yo vā cakṣurāyatanena rūpāyatanenāpi sa iti paścātpādakaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3779: yo rūpāyatanena samanvāgataḥ śrotrāyatanenāpi sa ityatra cāpi paścātpādakaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3781: yaḥ śrotrāyatanena samanvāgataścakṣurāyatanenāpi sa ityatra catuṣkoṭikam /
T06abhsubhu:3784: pūrvapādakaṃ dvayordharmayoḥ kathaṃcideva dharmamārabhya parasparaṃ pṛṣṭayoḥ pūrvadharmamadhiṣṭhāya yadvayākriyate /
T06abhsubhu:3785: tadyathā yajjñānaṃ jñeyamapi tadyadvā jñeyaṃ jñānamapi taditi /
T06abhsubhu:3787: syājjñeyaṃ na jñānam, tadanye dharmā iti //
T06abhsubhu:3788: paścātpādakaṃ tathaiva dvayordharmayoḥ parasparaṃ pṛṣṭayoryatpaścimamadhiṣṭhāya vyākriyate
T06abhsubhu:3789: tadyathā yadgrāhyaṃ grāhakamapi tadyadvā grāhakaṃ grāhyamapi taditi /
T06abhsubhu:3791: syādgrāhyaṃ na grāhakam, rūpādayaḥ pañca viṣayā
T06abhsubhu:3793: dvikoṭikaṃ yatra dve koṭī vyākriyete tadanyāsaṃbhavāt tadyathā skandhasya vyavasthānaṃ dhātuvyavasthānaṃ ca nigamayyocyate - yā skandhasaṃkhyā dhātusaṃkhyāpi sā, yā vā dhātusaṃkhyā skandhasaṃkhyāpi seti /
T06abhsubhu:3795: syāt skandhasaṃkhyā na dhātusaṃkhyā, rūpaskandho vijñānaskandhaścaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3796: tathāhi naiko dhāturasti yaḥ sakalarūpaskandhalakṣaṇo vā syāt sakalavijñānaskandhalakṣaṇo vā /
T06abhsubhu:3800: trikoṭikaṃ yatra tisra eva koṭayo vyākriyante /
T06abhsubhu:3801: tadyathā yā skandhasaṃkhyāyatanasaṃkhyāpi sā, yā vāyatanasaṃkhyā skandhasaṃkhyāpi seti
T06abhsubhu:3804: syāt skandhasaṃkhyāyatanasaṃkhyā ca vijñānaskandho manaāyatanaṃ ca /
T06abhsubhu:3807: tadyathā yaścakṣurindriyeṇa samanvāgataḥ śrotrendriyeṇāpi saḥ, yo vā śrotrendriyeṇa
T06abhsubhu:3813: oṃkāritaṃ yatra praśne vyākaraṇamomiti kriyate evametadityabhyupagamyata ityarthaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3814: tadyathā ye 'nityāḥ sarve te saṃskārāḥ, ye vā saṃskārāḥ sarve te 'nityā iti pṛṣṭena omiti vyākartavyam //
T06abhsubhu:3816: tadyathā skandhavinirmuktāḥ saṃskārāḥ katibhiḥ satyaiḥ saṃgṛhītā iti /
T06abhsubhu:3817: prātikṣepikam - na santi skandhavinirmuktāḥ saṃskārā iti //
T06abhsubhu:3837: ete cānupalambhā yat kiṃcidatītānāgatapratyutpannaṃ yāvadyadvā dūre yadvāntika ityetadanukramānusāreṇa draṣṭavyāḥ //
T06abhsubhu:3840: yo nopalabhate yadyena yasmai yato yasya yatra nopalabhate yāvadvividhaścānupalambha iti //
T06abhsubhu:3867: rājakulaṃ yatra rājā svayaṃ saṃnihitaḥ yuktakulaṃ yatra rājñādhiyuktāḥ sabhā vaṇik sabhādi
T06abhsubhu:3868: prāmāṇikāḥ sahāyakāḥ yeṣāṃ vacanaṃ vādiprativādinau na saṃśayataḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3869: dharmārthakuśalāśca śramaṇabrāhmaṇā ye teṣu śāstreṣu granthataścārthataśca vyutpannabuddhayaḥ
T06abhsubhu:3870: vādādhiṣṭhānaṃ yadadhiṣṭhāya vādaḥ kriyate tadyathā sādhyaṃ sādhanaṃ ca //
T06abhsubhu:3871: tatra svabhāvaḥ sādhya ātmasvabhāvo dharmasvabhāvaśca nāstīti vāstīti vā //
T06abhsubhu:3872: viśeṣaḥ sādhya ātmaviśeṣo dharmaviśeṣaśca sarvagato na sarvagato nityānityo rūpyarūpītyevamādibhiḥ prakāraiḥ //
T06abhsubhu:3874: sādhyagrahaṇaṃ yadi na kriyeta siddhasyāpi svapakṣasya pareṣāṃ deśanā pratijñā prasajyeta
T06abhsubhu:3875: svarucitārthagrahaṇaṃ na kriyeta parapakṣasyāpi sādhyasya vacanaṃ pratijñā prasajyeta /
T06abhsubhu:3878: saṃprāpaṇagrahaṇaṃ na kriyeta kāyenāpi tadarthābhinayanaṃ pratijñā prasajyeta /
T06abhsubhu:3879: vijñāpanāgrahaṇaṃ na kriyetāvijñāte 'pi tadarthe śrotṛbhiḥ pratijñā prasajyeta /
T06abhsubhu:3880: yathokte tu vyavasthāne sarva ete doṣā na bhavanti, tasmādevamasyā vyavasthānaṃ veditavyam
T06abhsubhu:3883: tathāhi pratyakṣānupalaṃbhādupalaṃbhādvetyanena samākhyānena tasmin sādhye 'pratītasyārthasya saṃpratyaya utpadyate /
T06abhsubhu:3885: pratyakṣopalaṃbhānupalaṃbhau punaḥ svabhāvaṃ liṅgaṃ cādhikṛtya veditavyau
T06abhsubhu:3886: dṛṣṭānto dṛṣṭenāntenādṛṣṭasyāntasya samīkaraṇasamākhyānam, pratītena bhāgenāpratītasya bhāgasya pratyāyanāya samākhyānamityarthaḥ //
T06abhsubhu:3888: yathā sādhyo 'rthastribhiravayavaiḥ sādhitastathā śiṣṭānāmapi tajjātīyānāṃ sādhyānāṃ sādhitārthadharmopagamāya nayatvena samākhyānaṃ yuktyātideśa upanayaḥ //
T06abhsubhu:3892: eṣāṃ pratijñādīnāmidamudāharaṇamātraṃ pradarśyate // tadyathā nairātmyavādinastadrūpe 'dhikaraṇe saprativādike nāstyātmeti vacanaṃ
T06abhsubhu:3895: sa hyātmā prajñapyamānaḥ skandhalakṣaṇo vā prajñapyeta, skandheṣu vā, anyatra vā skandhebhyaḥ, askandhako vā /
T06abhsubhu:3896: tadyadi skandhalakṣaṇastenāsvatantrāḥ skandhāḥ pratītyasamutpannā udagavyayadharmāṇastallakṣaṇa ātmānopapadyata iti doṣaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3897: atha skandheṣu tenānityaskandhāśrita ātmānityaḥ prāpnotīti doṣaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3898: athānyatra skandhebhyastena nirdehaka ātmā niṣprayojana iti doṣaḥ
T06abhsubhu:3899: / athāskandhakastena prakṛtyaiva muktasya kevalino mokṣārthaprayatnavaiyarthyamiti doṣaḥ //
T06abhsubhu:3901: taddhayatītaṃ vidyamānalakṣaṇatvena prajñapyamānaṃ vartamānalakṣaṇaṃ vā prajñapyeta,
T06abhsubhu:3902: vartamāne vā anyatra vā vartamānāt vartamānanirapekṣaṃ vā /
T06abhsubhu:3904: atha vartamāne tenāniruddhe niruddhātmakasya saṃbandho na yujyata iti doṣaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3905: athānyatra vartamānāttena vartamānaṃ hitvā na kiṃcittadvastūpalabhyate yatra tatprajñapyata iti doṣaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3909: vartamānaprajñaptau caturdoṣeṇa siddhenāsiddha ātmā nāstīti skandhaprajñaptau caturvidhadoṣopalaṃbhāt prasādhyate nāstīti //
T06abhsubhu:3910: evamātmaviparyāsaṃ pratiṣidhyaitayaiva yuktyā nityādayo 'pi na santītyatideśa upanayaḥ //
T06abhsubhu:3911: yasmādetadevaṃ tasmādanityāḥ pañca skandhāḥ yāvadanātmāna iti nigamanamiti
T06abhsubhu:3914: sadgrahaṇaṃ ghaṭādidravyāṇāṃ loke pratyakṣasaṃmatānāṃ pratyakṣatvavyudāsārtha prajñaptimātratvāt
T06abhsubhu:3919: pratyakṣādyadanyacchiṣṭamapratyakṣaṃ niyamena tatsahavarti prasiddhaṃ draṣṭuḥ pūrvaṃ tasya tatpratyakṣamīkṣamāṇasya tadanyasmin śiṣṭasaṃpratyaya utpadyate tenāpyatra bhavitavyametat sahavartineti tatpratyakṣapūrvakamanumānam /
T06abhsubhu:3922: yatropadeśe tatpratyakṣamanumānaṃ ca sarvathā na virudhyete na vyabhicarataḥ sa āptāgamaḥ saṃpratyayitvāt //
T06abhsubhu:3923: vādālaṃkāro yena yukto vādī vādaṃ kurvāṇo 'tyarthaṃ śobhate /
T06abhsubhu:3925: tatra svaparasamayajñatā svasiddhāntaṃ parasiddhāntaṃ cārabhya granthataścārthataśca paurvāparyeṇa nirantaraṃ vyutpattiparipākaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3932: tatra kathātyāgo 'sādhu mama sādhu tavetyevamādibhiḥ prakāraiḥ svaparavādadoṣaguṇābhyupagamaḥ
T06abhsubhu:3935: yathoktaṃ sūtre - āyuṣmāṃścundikastīrthikaiḥ saha vādaṃ kurvannavajānitvā pratijānāti pratijānitvāvajānātīti
T06abhsubhu:3949: 154) asthiraṃ yatpratijñāyāvajñātamavajñāya pratijñātamatitvaramāṇayā vācā hi tūrṇaparāmṛṣṭaḥ
T06abhsubhu:3955: vādaniḥsaraṇaṃ yena vādānniḥsarati, akaraṇena vā guṇadoṣau vicārya vādasya nigrahasthānānāsādanāt, karaṇena vā nirvahanāditi /
T06abhsubhu:3958: ātmano 'kauśalyaṃ vāde yāvadvādālaṅkāre 'vyutpattiḥ viparyayātprativādibhājanatādīni veditavyāni vāde bahukarā dharmā ye vāde 'vaśyamupayujyante /
T06abhsubhu:3959: tadyathā svaparasamayajñatā vāde bahukaro dharmo yena sarvatra kathāvastuni vādaṃ karoti /
T06abhsubhu:3961: kuśalapakṣaprayuktenetyuktvā pratipattisārakeṇeti vacanamāśayaviśuddhijñāpanārthaṃ na lābhasatkārādinimittaṃ śrutādikuśalapakṣe prayuktenetyarthaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3963: evaṃ ca svahitaparahitapratipannaḥ kṣipramanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyata ityayameṣāṃ padānāmanusaṃdhirveditavyaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:3964: avigṛhyāpi tāvadvāde kriyamāṇe prakṛtigambhīratvānmahāyānadharmasya durlabhājñā prāgeva vigṛhya
T06abhsubhu:3965: yaiśca saha vigṛhya vādaḥ kriyate te 'pi pratipattāro nājñābhiprāyāḥ pratibruvanti kiṃtarhyupālambhābhiprāyāḥ
T06abhsubhu:3966: yeṣvapi prāśnikeṣu sa vādaḥ kriyate te vāsabhyā avyutpannā vā bhavantyabhiniviṣṭā vā /
T06abhsubhu:3967: sarvo 'pi ca vādā prāyeṇa ṣaḍbhirdoṣairyukto bhavati /
T06abhsubhu:3968: tathāhi vādaṃ kurvāṇaḥ kadācidatirabhasenāsatpakṣamapi parigṛhyābhiniveśena chalajātinigrahasthānānyapi prayukte /
T06abhsubhu:3973: svayaṃ ca teṣu cittaṃ pradūṣayatītyebhiḥ ṣaḍbhirdoṣairyukto bhavati //
T06abhsubhu:3976: sati cānupaśame durlabhaṃ paracittānurakṣaṇaṃ svacittānurakṣaṇaṃ ca yena pare prasādaṃ labheran vimuktyāyatanayogena svacittaṃ samādhīyate /
T06abhsubhu:3977: prāyeṇa vāde kathamahaṃ jayeyaṃ pare parājīyerannityevaṃ cittaṃ samudācarati /
T06abhsubhu:3981: mātaraṃ pitaraṃ hatvā ityasyāṃ gāthāyāṃ loke yadatyarthamavadyaṃ pātakaṃ tadabhidhāyīnyakṣarāṇyetāni viśuddhau pariṇāmitāni /
T06abhsubhu:3988: tatra pratiniyato gurujano mātā pitā ca, pālako rājā, dakṣiṇīyaḥ śrotriyabrāhmaṇāḥ, teṣāṃ śuddhatarasamatatvāt /
T06abhsubhu:4004: hīno loke caturvidhaḥ - manaskarmahīnaḥ kāyakarmahīno vākkarmahīna upabhogahīnaśca /
T06abhsubhu:4005: manaskarmahīnaḥ punardvividhaḥ kuśalapravṛttivailomyena cāśrāddhaḥ, paralokādyasaṃpratyayena dānādiṣvaprayogāt /
T06abhsubhu:4010: upabhogahī naḥ śvā kā kaḥ preto vetyevamādikaḥ, charditabhakṣaṇāditi //
T06abhsubhu:4019: vāntāśo dṛṣṭe dharme upakaraṇabalena kāyaṃ saṃdhā rayato 'pi bhogajīvitāśābhāvāditi //
T06abhsubhu:4022: śarīraṃ punarasyāḥ samādhiṃ niśritya bodhisattvā darśanabhāvanāmārgābhyāṃ mahābodhiṃ spṛśantīti
T06abhsubhu:4026: yācanakaṃ ca dveṣṭi, svayaṃ grāhābhirucitatayā yācanakaprātikūlyāt /
T06abhsubhu:4027: na kiṃcit kadāciddadāti, sarvasya vastunaḥ sarvadā dānāt /
T06abhsubhu:4030: tatra parameṇa brahmacaryeṇa samanvāgata iti lokottareṇa mārgeṇetyarthaḥ /
T06abhsubhu:4031: nānyatra maithunānmaithunasya niḥsaraṇaṃ paryeṣata iti tasyaiva yathābhūta parijñānena tatprahāṇāt
T06abhsubhu:4037: maithunapratipakṣeṇa ca dharmeṇottrasyati tatpratipakṣeṇa mārgeṇa sarvasattvottaraṇāya vyavasyatīti kṛtvā /
T06abhsubhu:4038: abhīkṣṇaṃ ca dvayadvayaṃ samāpadyate saṃkleśavyavada nadvayena phalahetubhedena catuḥsatyātmakena
T06abhsubhu:4046: ityabhidharmasamuccaye bhāṣyataḥ sāṃkathyaviniścayo nāma pañcamaḥ samuccayaḥ samāptaḥ //
